scn aaaJaredRossDeathSCRIPT
int AMRCondition
begin OnLoad
set AMRCondition to 35 + GetRandomPercent * 65-35+1 / 100
end
Begin OnDeath

aaaJaredRossREF.removeitem aaaWeapJaredRossAMR 1 aaaJaredRossREF.additem WeapNVAntiMaterielRifle 1 AMRCondition
END

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tayback, William
ESP.TRADUIT: 威廉·泰拜克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: William "Billy" Tayback
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "I hired that fat asshole to entertain at my casino, and he fucked my wife between shows! I want him and his whole fat goddamn family dead! You should shove his stupid guitar up his ass, sideways!"
Additional Notes: First off, we're only targeting Billy, not his family. And not only will I not pay extra if I hear you sodomized him with a guitar, I'll actually deduct pay from you. Tayback is an NCR citizen and he's around the Strip, so make the killing quick, clean, and discreet. Otherwise you'll probably find yourself surrounded by troopers with cattle-prods in short order.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：威廉·比利·泰拜克
客户：匿名
签约理由:“我雇了那个胖子来我的赌场娱乐，他在演出间隙上了我老婆！我要他和他那该死的家人都死！你应该把他那该死的吉他塞进他的屁眼里，横着塞！”
附加说明：首先，我们只针对比利，而不是他的家人。如果我听到你用吉他鸡奸了他我不仅不会多付钱，还会扣你的钱。泰拜克是NCR公民，他就在长街附近，所以杀人要迅速，干净，谨慎。否则你可能很快就会发现自己被带着赶牛棍的士兵包围。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jiang, Lee
ESP.TRADUIT: 李江

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Lee "Daddy Lee" Jiang
Client: Krystal Chavez & Angel Brown
Reason for Contract: "Lee said he would just manage our services and make sure nobody got rough, but he beat all us way worse than any johns ever did. He done made us all work clients that we didn't want, and said he'd shoot us if we didn't. One time, he broke a broom across Suzie's back 'cause she asked him for free Jet. You should kill him or something! Get him to stop chasing us!"
Additional Notes: Apparently, the ladies who contracted this ran from Lee's employment, and he took off after 'em. We got a sighting of someone about his description, in the desert past the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：李“老爹李”江
客户：克里斯托·查韦斯&安琪儿·布朗
签约理由:“李说他只会管理我们的服务，以及确保没有人欺负我们，但他比任何一个嫖客都要狠得多。他让我们服务了我们不想要的客户，还说如果我们不做他就开枪。有一次，他把扫帚摔断在苏西的背上，因为她向他要免费的杰特。你应该杀了他！让他别再追我们了！”
附加说明：显然，染上这个病的女人是从李的手下逃出来的，李正在追她，我们在莫哈韦前哨基地附近的沙漠里，看到了一个跟他描述类似的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Johnson, Richard
ESP.TRADUIT: 理查德·约翰逊

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Richard "Dick" Johnson Jr.
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "Johnson defended the piece of shit that hurt my daughter in court. He got that filth acquitted by slandering my entire family, with a focus on my little girl, the same one that his client brutalized. That fucking trial cost us almost everything we had, and I won't let him live to do it to someone else."
Additional Notes: Johnson is the current personal lawyer of the Burke family, like his dad, Dick Johnson Sr. (They're all named after genitalia. Incredible.) before him. Ever since Dick Sr. died of some filthy disease, his son has been dutifully making sure that the Burkes don't face any legal consequences for their actions.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：小理查德·迪克·约翰逊
客户:匿名
签约理由:“约翰逊在法庭上为那个伤害我女儿的混蛋辩护。他诽谤了我的全家，还把重点放在了我的小女儿身上，让那个肮脏的人无罪释放，他的委托人曾虐待过我的小女儿。那个该死的审判几乎让我们倾家荡存，我不会让他活着去伤害别人的"
附加说明：约翰逊和他的父亲老迪克·约翰逊一样，是伯克家族目前的私人律师(他们都以生殖器命名。难以置信。）自从老迪克死于某种肮脏的疾病后，他的儿子就尽职尽责地确保伯克家不会因为他们的行为而面临任何法律后果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woodcock, Chunks
ESP.TRADUIT: 大块头伍德考克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Chunks Woodcock
Client: Alberta Studios
Reason for Contract: "Woodcock broke his contract, flipped off the camera, called me a little bitch, and stormed offstage. He also stole one of our costumes."
Additional Notes: If any of you are fans of the smut movies, you might remember Mr. Woodcock as "Centurion Magnus Perineum" from "Naughty Ranger Captured by Legionaries" 2 through 6. Apparently, the role went to his head, and he decided he actually would make a fine addition to Caesar's Legion. Legion will probably get all bitchy if you kill one of their new recruits, but fuck those idiots, right?
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称：大块头伍德考克
客户：阿尔伯塔工作室
签约理由:“伍德考克违约了，对着镜头发脾气，骂我是个贱人，然后气冲冲地走下舞台。他还偷了我们的一套戏服。”
附加说明：如果你们中有谁是色情电影的粉丝，你可能记得伍德考克在《顽皮的游骑兵被军团俘获》 2到6中饰演的“百夫长马格努斯·会阴”。显然这个角色冲昏了他的头脑，他决定为凯撒军团效力。如果你杀了他们的新成员，军团可能会大发雷霆，但去他妈的那些白痴，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Seriously, we're just supposed to hide in this closet 'til the boss gives the order? Why can't we just hide under boxes or some shit? No way this ambush will be worth the trouble. Dude had better to remember to let us out if this stupid mark doesn't show.
Hey, want to grab a drink after we're done here?
Jansen
ESP.TRADUIT:
说真的，我们就该躲在衣柜里等老板下命令吗？我们为什么不能躲在箱子或者其他什么东西下面呢？这次伏击不值得你费这么大劲。如果这个愚蠢的目标一直不出现，老兄最好记得放我们出去。
嘿，我们结束后想去喝一杯吗？
- 詹森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, Eugene
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈，尤金

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'll leave this stupid note in the mod data. It was supposed to just be another flavor note establishing that the guy holding it was a prick, but that was redundant and probably went on for too long. More to the point is that I fucking hate this piece of shit. I have never had so much hatred for a fictional character before.
This piece of trash won't do a goddamn fucking thing he's supposed to. Walk into the room and force a greeting? Nope, not under any circumstances. Open up dialogue if, and only if, the player is sitting down? No, he fucking tells you to sit down even if you already fucking are. Something as simple as, oh, I don't know, fucking saying his stupid line while still sitting in his chair? Nope, fuck you, he's standing up and fucking wandering! Everyone else's packages work just fucking fine, but Eugene Schrader, oh no, he's fucking special. He's magic, and his magic retard powers enable him to do whatever the fuck he wants, regardless of what he's fucking supposed to do.
I'd cut every fucking piece of dialogue this cunt has, and just make him a generic shoot-on-sight hostile, but noooooo, I already got a fucking voice actor to fucking record his fucking dialogue that he's too fucking goddamn stupid to fucking say, so I fucking have to fucking implement him in some fucking kind of fashion, or else I'll have to message the fucking voice actor and fucking say: "Hey, great job with the character. Unfortunately, he's become self aware, and he's a giant fucking gaping asshole, and I'm not fucking tech savvy enough to make him fucking function, so sorry bruh, looks like all the dialogue you recorded for me is being cut! Looks like we both got our fucking time wasted buddy!"
It's especially funny because this fucking stupid shit is basically the one and only fucking thing preventing me from releasing this goddamn fucking thing right now. Yeah, sure, gotta record five-or-so lines that didn't get recorded last time. Yeah, because fucking talking into my fucking mic is going to be a fucking time sink. Oh, wait, no it fucking won't. You know what fucking will? This fucking shit right here! Try to make him trigger his dialogue, load the fucking game, walk into his room, and see his fucking cunt face staring back at me, not saying fuckall.
Try another method, load the game, same fucking shit. Over and over and fucking over, this is some goddamn definition of insanity bullshit. I'm not even getting fucking paid! This isn't a hobby, 'cause it's about as fun as sticking pushpins under my fingernails, and it isn't a job, 'cause I've never gotten a single cent from anyone. Why am I fucking doing this shit? What the fuck is wrong with me? Have I lost my mind? If so, I think we can safely say that it's entirely because this motherfucking cocksucking thundercunt son of a fucking goddamn whore has driven me to this state god fucking damn it I hate everything and everyone and when I snap and blow myself up along with an entire city block, I want everyone to fucking point to this stupid mod and say: "It's that piece of shit Eugene Schrader, he's the fucking one to blame" gaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA kill me kill me kill me hate hate hate hate
ESP.TRADUIT:
我会在mod数据中留下这张愚蠢的便条。这应该只是另一种味道证明拿着它的人是个混蛋，但这是多余的，而且可能持续了太久。更重要的是，我恨死这混蛋了。我从未对一个虚构的人物有过如此强烈的仇恨。
这垃圾不会做他该做的事。走进房间，强行打招呼?不，任何情况下都不行。当且仅当玩家坐下来时，开启对话?不，他让你坐下，即使你已经坐下了。简单到，哦，我不知道，还坐在椅子上说他的愚蠢台词?不，去你妈的，他站着晃悠呢!其他人的包都他妈没问题，但尤金·施拉德尔，不，他他妈很特别。他有魔法，他的魔法弱智能力让他能做他想做的任何事，不管他该做什么。
我会把每一个他妈的该死的对话这个女人,让他一个通用的就地开枪敌对,但noooooo,我已经得到了一个他妈的声音演员他妈的记录他该死的对话,他太他妈的他妈的该死的愚蠢的说,所以我他妈的他妈的实现他在一些该死的时尚,否则我就得给那个该死的配音说:“嘿，这个角色演得不错。不幸的是，他开始有自我意识了，他是一个大混蛋，而我他妈的没有足够的技术来让他运作，所以抱歉，兄弟，看来你给我录的所有对话都被剪掉了!看来我们都得到了我们的浪费时间的朋友!”
特别好笑的是这个该死的破玩意是唯一一个阻止我把这破玩意放出去的东西。是啊，我得录五句上次没录的台词。是啊，因为对着我的麦克风说话简直是浪费时间。哦，等等，不，不会的。你知道什么会吗?这该死的东西!试着让他触发对话，加载该死的游戏，走进他的房间，然后看到他那该死的臭脸盯着我，不说"妈的"
试试另一种方法，加载游戏，还是一样。一遍又一遍，这简直就是精神错乱的定义。我他妈连工资都拿不到!这不是爱好，因为这就像把图钉插在我的指甲里一样有趣，这也不是工作，因为我从来没有从任何人那里得到过一分钱。我他妈为什么要这么做?我他妈有什么毛病?我疯了吗?如果是这样,我想我们可以安全地说这是完全因为这不要脸的cocksucking thundercunt他妈的该死的妓女的儿子推我到这个状态神他妈的该死的我讨厌的人和事都当我提前和吹自己整个街区,我希望每个人都他妈的指向这个愚蠢的mod,说:"这是尤金·施瑞德那坨屎，他才是该死的罪魁祸首"杀了我杀了我恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨恨！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sullivan, Roy
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伊·苏利文

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Roy Sullivan
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "Sullivan is cutting into my business. I want him dead, and any documentation burned."
Reason for Rejection: Sullivan bought out his own contract. Fair enough.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：罗伊·苏利文
客户：匿名
签约理由：“苏利文要插手我的生意。我要他死，烧掉所有文件。”
拒绝理由：苏利文买断了自己的合同，很公平。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Filthy Bill"
ESP.TRADUIT: “下流比尔”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: "Filthy Bill"
Client: Westside Militia
Reason for Contract: "Put simply, Bill is the most depraved son-of-a-bitch I've ever encountered. He killed a whole family a few miles out of town, and left their mutilated corpses on display. It was fucking nightmarish. He needs to die."
Reason for Rejection: This is the kind of contract that I'd love to take on, but after a bit of investigating, I'm 99% positive that Bill left the Mojave several months ago. He's someone else's problem, now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：“下流比尔”
客户：西区民兵
签约理由：“简单地说，比尔是我见过的最堕落的狗娘养的。他在镇外几英里处杀了一家人，并把他们残破的尸体陈列在那里，真是他妈的一场噩梦。他必须死。”
拒绝理由：我很愿意接受这种合同，但经过一番调查，我99%肯定比尔几个月前就离开了莫哈维。他现在是别人的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Property Deed
ESP.TRADUIT: 产契

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Congradulations! Your now the new owner of the Novac Bridge! Show this cool deed to anyone that you meat and let them know how cool you are! This deed is you're property just like the bridge, forever. No refunds ever no matter what! Enjoy you're new bridge that you own! This document is legally blinding.
Love Joey Mays King of reel estate
ESP.TRADUIT:
祝贺你！你现在是诺瓦克桥的新主人了！把这份很酷的契约展示给任何你喜欢的人，让他们知道你有多酷！这个契约是你的财产，就像桥一样，永远都是。无论怎样，都不会退款的！享受你拥有的新桥吧！这份文件在法律上是盲目的。
爱你的， - 乔伊·梅斯 房地产之王

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June First, 2278
Ridiculous how much money those assholes wanted to get this place renovated. And then to demand invitations to the opening day party, too. Well, if they had been less greedy, I wouldn't have had to toast them with my special bottle of cyanide tequila. Haha. But, really, I poisoned all the contractors and buried them in the desert. Maybe I'll remember that trick for my wife.
Oh, speaking of filthy goddamn whores, Marino is worthless. I told him I want classy women for classy clientele. The group he brought me were all strung-out and used-up. I swear, one of them had more track marks than hair. Fuentes tells me that he knows an ace slaver with contacts up in Point Pillage. I cannot possibly imagine a whipped slave as being classier than a junkie, but, hey.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2278年6月的第一天,
可笑的是，那些混蛋居然要花这么多钱来翻修这地方，然后还要求邀请他们参加开幕式派对。好吧，如果他们没那么贪心，我就不用拿我特制的氰化物龙舌兰酒来敬他们了，哈哈。但说真的，我毒死了所有承包人然后把他们埋在沙漠里。也许我会为我的妻子记住这一招。
哦，说到肮脏的婊子，马里诺一文不值。我告诉他我想要优雅的女人来吸引优雅的客户，他带来的那群人都是什么玩意。我发誓，其中一个身上的伤痕比头发还多。富恩特斯告诉他认识一个在劫掠角有关系的王牌奴隶贩子。我无法想象一个被鞭打的奴隶比一个瘾君子更有品位，但是，嘿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
August Eighth, 2278
Well, holy shit. That slaver Fuentes set me up with, Schrader, got back to me today with seven of the hottest girls I've ever seen. I mean, these ladies were perfect tens, all around. Looks, attitude, dress. And none of 'em had beeping collars, so I was more than a little amazed when Schrader tells me that, oh yeah, these are the slaves he got from his vacation up north. Look, far be it from me to criticize, but all seven of 'em seemed to want me right away. You tell me girls that eager, no collars in sight, no scars or guns aimed at their heads, are slaves?
Well, we'll open for business soon. See how that shit goes. Fingers crossed.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2278年8月8日
好吧，我的天。富恩特斯给我介绍的那个奴隶贩子，施拉德尔，今天给我带来了我见过的最性感的七个女孩。我的意思是，这些女人都十分完美，全方位的，外表、态度,穿着。他们都没有带着哔哔声的项圈，所以当施拉德尔告诉我，这些是他在北方度假时得到的奴隶时，我非常吃惊。听着，我不想批评，但她们七个人似乎都想马上得到我。你告诉我，那些渴望的女孩，看不到项圈，没有伤疤，也没有枪对准她们的头，是奴隶？
好吧，我们很快就开始营业了，看看会发生什么。祈祷吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jan First, 2279
And just like that, I'm flush for life. I figured opening day would bring in, you know, couple dozen clients, but... Goddamn, Marino worked out for once. I told him to direct some classy, discerning customers my way, and I guess he finally found a job he could do well. The girls made me more cash than I know what to do with, and that's not counting all the money spent at tables, or emptying the bars. That isn't hyperbole, either. There ain't a drop of liquor outside of my personal stash in here, right now.
That Sullivan guy cornered me and offered me a stake in his underground poker venture, again. I was seriously considering it when I saw how much cash was being thrown around, but then I remembered... well, how much cash was being thrown around. I don't need the extra income, and I sure as shit don't need to take on his extra risk. He can work out his own deal.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2279年1月的第一天，
就这样，我这辈子都有钱了。我原以为开业日最多有几十个客户，但是...该死，马里诺总算成功了一次。我让他介绍一些有品位，有眼光的顾客，我想他最终找到了一份他能胜任的工作。姑娘们给我赚的钱多得我都不知道该怎么花了，这还不算在赌桌上花的钱和清空酒吧的钱。这也不是夸张，现在这里除了我的私藏以外，一滴酒都没有了。
那个叫苏利文的家伙把我逼到墙角，又让我在他的地下扑克企业中入股。当我看到这么多钱被乱扔的时候，我正在认真考虑这个问题，但后来我想起来了...有多少钱被浪费了。我不需要额外的收入，我很确定我不需要承担他额外的风险。他可以自己解决自己的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
April Fifteenth, 2280
That's it, I'm cutting Schrader out. I don't know what kind of psycho-shit murderers he usually does business with, but I still got the original seven girls he sold me, plus the five he supplied me since then. But I swear to god, every other day, one of his people come knockings, telling me to buy more, I must need more, supplies must be low. I told that old fucking cyclops the first time, I don't have much of any sort of turnover rate. I'm telling my security team to be on high alert. Guy like this just screams: "Hey, I'm a fucking lunatic, if you don't do what I want, I'll burn your goddamn house down."
ESP.TRADUIT:
2280年4月15日,
够了，我要把施拉德尔踢出去，我不知道他通常跟什么样的变态杀人犯做生意。但我还留着他最初卖给我的七个女孩，还有他后来提供给我的五个。但我对天发誓，每隔一天，他的人就会来敲门，告诉我多买些，我必须多买些，供给一定很低。我第一次就跟那个该死的老独眼巨人说过，我的员工流动率不高。我要让我的安保团队保持高度警惕。这样的人会尖叫:“嘿，我他妈是个疯子，如果你不照我说的做，我就把你的房子烧了。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 5
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 5

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I think now would be a good time to hand the reins over to Fuentes.
Apparently, one of my clients, rich connected prick, got his daughter snatched. This wouldn't concern me, 'cept apparently I did too good a job making this place safe and exclusive, because Mr. Customer decided that the hostage exchange will happen here. My objections got me a gun stuck in my fucking mouth. So, pretty soon, this guy is sending his team of bagmen in, led by some asshole named Jones. Jones and his boys are gonna be followed shortly by the kidnappers and the daughter, Grace. I'm keeping my security force to oversee the deal, and Fuentes is going to make sure it all goes smoothly.
I've made enough money to be set for life. Shit like this is bad for business, and someone's gonna take things personal. I'm not gonna be anywhere near here when the deal goes down, and I'm taking all my non-security staff with me. I 100% guarantee, even if this deal goes down smooth as can be, there will still be repercussions. Nope, I abdicate my throne. People get too greedy, won't quit while they're ahead. Not me. Fuentes can have it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我认为现在是把缰绳交给富恩特斯的好时机。
显然，我的一个客户，有钱有势的混蛋，他的女儿被绑架了。这不关我的事，不过我把这地方的安全和专一性做得太好了，因为这位客户决定在这里进行人质交换。我想反对但只是让我的嘴被枪卡住而已。很快，这家伙就会派他的手下团队进来，由一个叫琼斯的混蛋领导。琼斯和他的手下很快就会被绑匪和他女儿格蕾丝跟踪。我会让我的安保人员监督交易，富恩特斯会确保一切顺利进行。
我赚了足够的钱，可以过安稳的生活了。这种事对生意不好，会有人把事情牵扯到个人身上。交易结束后，我不会再靠近这里了，我要把所有非安保人员都带走。我百分之百保证，即使交易进展顺利，也会有负面影响。不，我放弃我的王位，人们太贪心了，不会在领先的时候放弃，但我不是。富恩特斯可以拥有它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folded Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 折叠的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alright, Fuentes, good news. I've made more than enough cash for myself here. I'll give the reins to you, like you've been asking, on one condition.
Apparently, a couple of clients have had a small disagreement. Specifically, one of 'em kidnapped the beloved daughter of another, and is holding her for ransom. Despite my attempts at convincing them otherwise, they've decided that the Casa will be the location for the exchange. That means a lot of money and a lot of armed guys are going to be around. If you keep things under control, then the whole business is yours, with the exception of the girls, 'cause I own their contracts.
I'm leaving all the security guys for you, and my advice would be that you deploy the lot of them, otherwise this whole thing is going to get way out of hand. Last bit of advice: Keep the girl alive, happy, and healthy.
Luis
ESP.TRADUIT:
好了，富恩特斯，好消息。我在这里赚的钱已经够多了。我会把控制权交给你，就像你一直要求的那样，但有一个条件。
很显然，有几个客户有点小分歧。具体来说，其中一个绑架了另一个人心爱的女儿，并为了勒索赎金而劫持了她。尽管我试图说服他们，但他们还是决定在家庭进行交易。这意味着会有很多钱和很多持枪的人在附近。如果你能控制住局面，那整个生意就归你了，除了姑娘们，因为她们的合同是我的。
我要把所有的保安都留给你，我的建议是你把所有的保安都部署好，否则整件事就会一发不可收拾。最后一点建议:让这个女孩活着，开心，健康。
- 路易斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 订单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dodge, the exchange goes down in the manager's office at Casa Madrugada. Bring the girl, and a lot of muscle. If Lancaster has any sense, he won't try to fuck us when his girl is in the crossfire. Casa Security shouldn't interfere, but I'm sure they'll be jumpy, so keep everything on the level. Once you've got the money, get the fuck out. Have your boys cover all the exits and make sure that Lancaster's bagmen don't follow you out.
One last thing. Make sure that the girl isn't hurt or killed, no matter what. She's our meal ticket, understand? Even if the meet goes to hell, you keep her secure, and bring her back in one piece. She dies, and we've got nothing. If the deal goes as planned, no rough stuff, then, and only then, is she to be released into their custody.
ESP.TRADUIT:
道奇，交易地点在黎明之家的行政办公室。带上那个女孩，多带些肌肉男。如果兰开斯特还有脑子的话，他就不会在他的女人身处险境的时候来干我们。家族保安应该不会干涉，但我肯定他们会紧张的，所以要保持正常。一旦你拿到钱，就赶紧滚蛋。让你的人守住所有出口确保兰开斯特的人不会跟着你出去。
最后一件事。无论发生什么事，都要确保那女孩不受伤害或死亡。她是我们的饭票，明白吗？就算会面不顺利，你也要保护好她，把她完好无损地带回来。她死了，我们就一无所有了。如果交易按计划进行，没有暴力，那么，也只有到那时，她才会被释放，由他们监护。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instructions
ESP.TRADUIT: 指令

ESP.ORIGINAL: The exchange is happening in the manager's office at the Casa Madrugada. No matter what happens, Gracie's safety is paramount. You'll be given several duffle bags, filled with money, as instructed. I've also included one extra. That one is filled with explosives, rigged to a timer. A special present from me, just for those pieces of shit. The rigged one is marked with a tag. Won't mean anything to anyone else, but you'll know it when you see it. I don't expect the security staff will give your men any trouble, but try not to provoke them. As for the kidnappers, it's in their best interest if the meet goes calmly and according to plan, so try to keep things smooth. That said, once Gracie is safe and secure, you have my permission to do everything in your power to capture or kill any of those fuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交易地点在黎明之家的行政办公室。不管发生什么，格蕾西的安全是最重要的。我们会按指示给你几个装满钱的行李袋，我还额外加了一个。那个装满了炸药，装上了定时器。这是我送给你的特别礼物，专门为这些垃圾准备的。装炸药那个上面有个标签，对别人来说没什么意义，但你一看到就知道了。我觉得安保人员不会给你的人惹麻烦，但也别招惹他们。对于绑匪来说，如果会面能按照计划平静进行，对他们最有利，所以尽量让事情顺利进行。也就是说，一旦格蕾西安全了，我允许你尽你所能去抓或者杀那些混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holotape
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息磁带

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got word that the management is forcing us all out for a few days. Like I haven't paid for a whole week? Nobody's mentioned refunding me. This is ridiculous. They better not have moved my stuff when I get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说管理层要让我们所有人离开几天。就像我没有支付一整个星期的费用似的？也没人说要退我钱，真是荒谬。我回来的时候他们最好不要动我的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
September 2074
First year of high school. I guess if the world is gonna end and I'll have to live in dad's bunker, it would be best if it happened right now. I'm not gonna tell anyone about it. I don't want to be known as bunker-girl already. Imagine all the cool things he could have bought with that money? I guess he wanted to sink it somewhere mom's lawyers couldn't get it from him. If the world ends, she had better not sneak inside.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2074年9月
高中第一年。我想如果世界要毁灭了我就得住在爸爸的地堡里，最好现在就发生。我不会告诉任何人的。我不想被人说成是地堡女孩。想象一下他用那笔钱可以买多少酷的东西？我猜他是想把它藏到妈妈的律师找不到的地方。如果世界末日来临，她最好不要偷偷溜进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
December 2074
So, I'm getting some cool stuff for Christmas. Dad hid my presents in the bunker. I guess he thought I wouldn't think of that?
I seriously hope the world doesn't end, because that bunker is so small. Dad says it isn't small, and that there are some bunkers designed for just one person, and they're cramped even then. Ugh, I think I'd rather die in the war.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2074年12月
所以，我要为圣诞节准备些很酷的东西。爸爸把我的礼物藏在地堡里，我猜他以为我不会想到这一点？
我真的希望世界不会毁灭，因为那个地堡太小了。爸爸说它并不小，有些地堡是专为一个人设计的，即使这样也很拥挤。唉，我想我宁愿死在战争中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
February 2075
Kim was over today and I showed her the bunker. Dad caught us and was really mad, 'cause he said that if other people knew about it, they would try to break in. But I reminded him that there's only two of us, and he put six beds in there, so we could bring Kim along too. I just looked like I was gonna cry, and he agreed to let her stay if the world ends. At least now I'll have someone else to talk to if it happens.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2075年2月
金今天来了，我带她看了看地堡。爸爸发现了我们，非常生气，因为他说如果别人知道了，他们会试图闯进来的。但我提醒他我们只有两个人，而他在里面放了六张床，所以我们也可以把金带过来。我看起来就像要哭了，他同意让她留下来，如果世界末日。至少现在，如果世界末日发生，我还有人可以倾诉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
February 2075, 2
OK, so it won't be the worst thing ever if the world ends and we have to use the bunker! Since Kim would be staying, dad decided the bunker is too small, and he is going to expand it! We can get separate rooms, and maybe put an entertainment area... Kim wants to be an Olympic swimmer, so we could put a pool down there too. Once dad is finished working on it, I don't mind if the world blows up, 'cause no more school.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2075年2月2日
好吧，就算世界毁灭了，我们不得不使用地堡，这也不是最糟糕的事！因为金要留下来，爸爸觉得地堡太小了，他要扩建！我们可以得到独立的房间，也许还可以放一个娱乐区...金想成为奥运会游泳运动员，所以我们也可以在那里建一个游泳池。一旦爸爸完成了，我也不介意世界会爆炸，因为我不用再上学了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 5
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 5

ESP.ORIGINAL:
May 2075
Oh my god, I forgot how loud it is when he worked on the first part of the bunker. I am never going to sleep until he finishes the renovations. I've been hearing power tools for months now. For the love of god, just finish working on that thing before I lose my mind.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2075年5月
我的天啊，我都忘了他在地堡的第一部分工作的时候有多吵了。他不装修完我就睡不着。几个月来我一直听到电动工具的声音。看在上帝的份上，在我疯掉之前赶紧把那东西弄好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 6
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 6

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June 2075
Dad is really excited 'cause he says that he is pretty sure that there's a natural cavern behind one of the new walls. He says that he can get in there real quickly, and turn it into another new area in half the time.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2075年6月
爸爸非常兴奋，因为他说他很确定其中一堵新墙后面有一个天然的洞穴。他说他可以很快进入那里把它变成另一个新区域。 并且只需要花费预计时间的一半。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Log 7
ESP.TRADUIT: 日志 7

ESP.ORIGINAL:
July 2075
OK, dad just suddenly stopped working on the bunker. He returned all his digging equipment and says that me and Kim aren't allowed to go down there unless the war happens. Not sure exactly what he thinks two young women would be doing down there, alone in tight, private quarters all by themselves, but whatever. I don't want to go in the stupid bunker anyways.
I want a puppy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
2075年7月
好吧，爸爸突然停止了对地堡的挖掘工作。他归还了所有的挖掘设备还说除非发生战争否则我和金绝对不能去那里。不知道他觉得两个年轻女人会在下面做什么，单独一个人在狭小的私人空间里，但无所谓了。反正我也不想去那个破地堡。
我想要一只小狗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frank
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Frank
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "Frank's a serial-rapist running around Freeside, victimizing intoxicated ladies. Someone should probably kill him.
Additional Notes: Nope. Happy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：弗兰克
客户:匿名
签约理由:“弗兰克是一个连环强奸犯，在自由城到处骚扰醉酒的女性。也许应该有人杀了他。“
附加说明:没啥，狩猎快乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Missing Persons!
ESP.TRADUIT: 失踪人员！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: N/A
Client: Westside Militia, Maddie O'Doyle
Reason for Contract: "People have been vanishing along the road on the north outskirts of Vegas. It's not Fiend territory, so unlikely to be them. There's a very small Jackal hangout nearby, but nowhere near big/organized enough to be this efficient. No obvious signs of missing folks, so searching around inside nearby buildings might be the best bet."
Additional Notes: Lack of information combined with a high casualty rate means that more likely than not, this will be a high-risk job.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：N/A
客户：西区民兵，麦迪·奥多伊尔
签约原因：“人们一直在维加斯北郊的路上消失。这里不是恶魔帮的领地，所以不太可能是他们。附近有一个很小的豺狼帮聚会场所，但他们规模不大，组织度也不高。 没有明显的人失踪线索，所以在附近的建筑物内搜索可能是最好的选择。”
附加说明：缺乏信息加上高伤亡率意味着这很可能是一项高风险工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall's Log 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰德尔的日志1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Think I found an unclaimed house. Had to pull boards off of the door, so seems like a good bet that nobody else is here. Couple of beds, plus it looks like there's a basement. The hatch is locked, but I could always take an axe to the door if I can't find a key.
Sandra would have laughed, but the first thing I did when I decided to stay was to hang some crosses on the walls. I've seen fliers around for some kinda church thing somewhere around North Vegas or Westside. I'll check it out.
Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
我想我找到了一栋无人认领的房子。得把门上的板子拉下来，看来这里肯定没其他人。有几张床，还有个地下室。舱门是锁着的，但如果我找不到钥匙，我可以用斧头把门劈开。
桑德拉会笑出声的，但当我决定留下来的时候，我做的第一件事就是在墙上挂几个十字架。我在北维加斯或西区见过一些教堂活动的传单。我去看看。
- 兰德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall's Log 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰德尔的日志2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's not a basement, it's a bunker! Fully stocked with beds and food and clean water! This may be the most solid structure in the entire Vegas area. This being Vegas, I'm sure that some people would attribute this to golden luck, but I say this was meant to be. I was drawn here for a reason. After all that I've suffered, Sandra and the rest, I always kept faith, and the Lord has answered my prayers.
There were some skeletons down here. The pre-war inhabitants, I suppose. I guess they decided to spend their lives down here instead of risking things above ground. Can't blame them, really. I buried the three of them up topside. It was the least I could do.
The back room down here is odd, though. Seems unfinished. One section of the wall is just bare concrete. Looks much shoddier than the rest of the construction. I may take a pickaxe to it later. Could easily be some more goods hidden away. If it's too much for just me, I'll donate the rest to Westside.
Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
这不是地下室，而是个地堡！充足的床位，食物和干净的水！这可能是整个维加斯地区最坚固的建筑了。这里是维加斯，我相信有些人会把这归因于好运，但我认为这是命中注定的。我被吸引到这里是有原因的。在经历了桑德拉和其他的一切之后，我一直保持着信仰，上帝回应了我的祈祷。
这里有一些骨架。我想是战前的居民吧。我猜他们决定在这里度过他们的一生而不是在地面上冒险。这不能怪他们，真的。我把他们三个埋在上面了，这是我唯一能做的。
但后面的房间很奇怪，似乎没有完工。有一段墙是光秃秃的混凝土，看起来比其他的建筑要简陋得多，我以后可能会拿鹤嘴锄去清理。很可能是藏了更多的东西，如果这对我来说太多，我就把剩下的都捐给西区。
- 兰德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall's Log 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰德尔的日志3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I have seen Him. He is down here, with me. He called out to me and brought me here. He is with me, now.
Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
我看见他了，他在下面，和我在一起。他呼唤我，把我带到这里。他现在和我在一起。
- 兰德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall's Log 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰德尔的日志4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I woke up this morning and found my sheets soaked in blood. My skin hurt and when I tried to wash it, it sloughed off in wet strips. He doesn't want me to have skin anymore, so I took the rest of it off.
It is not for me to keep Him to myself. His perfection must be shared, He has told me. Many will refuse, He says. They will avert their eyes, so they must be cut out. But those who embrace Him shall live forever as the vessels of his will. Death is not the end!
ESP.TRADUIT:
我今天早上醒来，发现我的床单被血浸透了。我的皮肤很疼，当我想洗的时候，它就湿漉漉的条状脱落了。祂不希望我再有皮肤，所以我把剩下的皮肤拿掉了。
我不应该把祂留给自己。祂告诉我，他的完美必须被分享。祂说，许多人将拒绝，他们会转移视线，所以他们必须被剪除。但是，那些拥抱祂的人将作为他意志的器皿永远活着。死亡不是终点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Norton, John
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰·诺顿

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Jonathan "Crazy Johnny" Norton
Client: Ryan O'Neill
Reason for Contract: "If we're going to get Primm back on the road to prosperity and peace, we need to clear these outlaws from area. Some lunatic named Johnny Norton moved his gang into that old drive-in theater outside of town."
Additional Notes: Apparently, Johnny here is so batshit crazy, that the Fiends kicked his spastic ass out of Vault 3. Let that sink in.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：乔纳森“疯狂约翰尼”诺顿
客户：瑞安·奥尼尔
签约理由：“如果我们想让普瑞姆回到繁荣与和平的道路上，我们需要清除这些不法之徒。一个叫约翰尼·诺顿的疯子把他的团伙转移到了城外那个旧的汽车影院。”
附加说明：很明显，约翰尼疯了，恶魔帮把他从3号避难所踢了出来。让我们慢慢理解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Park, Patrick
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕特里克·帕克

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Patrick "Facebreaker" Park
Client: New Reno Boxing Enthusiasts Club
Reason for Contract: "Facebreaker is a cheating shit. He was supposed to take a dive during the match with Pretty Carl, but I guess that wounded his pride, 'cause he strapped a ballistic fist on under his boxing glove, and blew Carl's head open as soon as the match started. Two can play at that game."
Additional Notes: Some vagrant-types reported that Patrick is hiding out in the sewers, somewhere under Vegas. Have fun with that.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名字：帕特里克"破相者"帕克
客户：新里诺拳击爱好者俱乐部
签约理由：“破相者是一个作弊的狗屎。在和漂亮卡尔的比赛中，他本应该被击倒的，但我想这伤了他的自尊心，因为他在拳击手套里绑了一个铳枪拳套，比赛一开始就打爆了卡尔的头。那一套不只你会，我也会。"
附加说明：一些流浪汉报告说帕特里克躲在下水道里，在维加斯下面的某个地方。玩得开心点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snyder, Charles
ESP.TRADUIT: 查尔斯·斯奈德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Charles "Funky Charlie" Snyder
Client: Ted Stevenson
Reason for Contract: "I saw that creepy bastard Charlie agin (sic) last nite (sic). He was dressed like a woman and he led his followers into the sewers to perform Satanic rituals, eating babys (sic) and having blood orgies. They all need to die or they'll kill everyone in the hole (sic) damn Mojave!!!"
Additional Notes: I have absolutely no fucking idea what this old drunk is on about, but I'll give him credit on two counts. Number one, he had the cash up front. Number two, there actually is a man named "Funky Charlie" hosting clandestine meetings with his weird little friends in the sewer. I won't turn down the paycheck, so off to work you go. There's a manhole directly in front of McCarran that should lead down pretty close to Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：查尔斯"时髦查理"斯奈德
客户：泰德·史蒂文森
签约理由:“我昨晚又看到那个令人毛骨悚然的混蛋查理了(原文如此)。他打扮得像个女人，他把追随者带到下水道里举行撒旦式的仪式，吃婴儿(原文如此)，进行血液狂欢。他们都得死，否则他们会杀死洞（原文如此）该死的莫哈韦的所有人！！！
附加说明：我完全不知道这个老酒鬼在说什么，但我有两个理由相信他。第一，他预付了钱；第二，有一个叫"时髦查理"的人在下水道里和他的奇怪的小朋友们秘密会面。我不会拒绝钱的，所以你去工作吧。麦卡伦正前方有个检修孔应该很靠近查理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dave's Reminders
ESP.TRADUIT: 戴夫的提醒

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alright, Dave. Since you insist on being a fucking idiot, here's a list of daily reminders for you. Like the dumb child you apparently are.
1. The key belongs on the table outside, by the boats. If it ends up in your pocket, my boot is ending up in your teeth.
2. This one is easy! If you see anyone that isn't one of us, you shoot them until they're dead.
3. If you want to fuck hookers, fine. That's your business. But if you ever tell one of them about our operation here again, I'll kill her, and then you. The only reason I didn't kill the first one is because I wasn't allowed to bring a gun into Gomorrah.
4. Fuck yourself.
- Mac
ESP.TRADUIT:
好吧，戴夫。既然你坚持做个白痴，这是给你的每日提醒清单。你就像个傻孩子一样。
1.钥匙应该放在外面船边的桌子上。如果它最后出现在你的口袋里，我的靴子就会出现在你的牙齿上。
2.这个很简单！如果你看到我们以外的人，你就直接开枪打死他们。
3.如果你想上妓女，没问题，那是你的权利。但如果你再把我们在这里的行动告诉她们中的一个，我就杀了她，然后再杀你。我没杀第一个的唯一原因是因为我不能带枪进入蛾摩拉。
4.去你吗的。
- 麦克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mac's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦克的日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Entry 1
Cohen had some interesting stories today. I'd be more interested if he wasn't a compulsive liar and general rat-bastard. Said there's a little tunnel on the other side of the Colorado river. And inside this tunnel, at the end, he says there's some kind of solid, reinforced metal-and-concrete wall. Said he'd sell me the location if I paid him 5000, up front. Well, I tell him, you walk me there and show me in person, and I'll believe him and fork over the cash. A bit surprised he agreed, so we'll see what happens.
Entry 2
Well, shit. It's right there, just like he said. That's real fucking weird. He says that he's been checking old-world maps and blueprints, and that he's fairly sure that we're looking at the exterior wall for a government gold depository. The normal way in is Legion country though. They may or may not take issue with my presence, but I know for a fact that they use gold for their funny-money, and there's no way I could haul tons of it out without them noticing and taking it. So, the way I see it, you got me, a lifetime of wealth, and a wall in between. Looks like I'll need a bigass drill. Cohen didn't have any advice for getting in, and wanted nothing to do with this operation. His loss. He did want 5000 though. Thing is, he doesn't have any loyalty to me. He's a self-interested little weasel, and I'd stake my life that he'd sell this info to other people, too. That in mind, I saved my money and put a bullet in his skull. So, the next step is to get a team.
Entry 3
Well, I got a little crew from back home. That fucking idiot Dave is one of them, but I'll just keep him away from the thinking-jobs. Problem is, that vault is gonna be a bitch to get through. A couple of guys had been whacking at it with pickaxes and sledgehammers, and they didn't even dent that wall. New plan.
Entry 4
Alright, this is more like it. I got a fuckload of explosives. The C4 was pricey, but the dynamite was free, minus the price of the bullets we pumped into those Powder Gangers. If all that ain't enough, I tossed that mini-nuke my grandma gave me when I turned 25 on top of the pile. Thanks nana! Time to set up shop. Hopefully no one crashes the party, which wouldn't even be a factor if not for fucking Dave. That asshole tried to get a freebie from a Gomorrah hooker by telling her how: "My buddy Mac found a giant prewar treasure-vault on the other side of the river!" I'm starting to think those rumors about his parents being siblings are entirely accurate. I like how, while he was telling our plans to a hooker, the only lie he thought to include was that he and I were "buddies".
ESP.TRADUIT:
条目1
科恩今天讲了一些有趣的故事。我更感兴趣的是他到底是不是一个撒谎成性的混蛋。他说在科罗拉多河对岸有个小隧道。在隧道的尽头，他说有某种坚固的钢筋金属混凝土墙。说如果我先付给他5000块，他会把位置卖给我。好吧，我告诉他，你带我去那里，亲自带我看，我会相信他并付钱。我有点惊讶他居然同意了，所以我们看看会发生什么。
条目2
噢，该死。就在那里，就像他说的那样，真他妈奇怪。他说他一直在查旧世界的地图和设计图，他很确定我们在找的是政府的金库。不过正常情况得从军团的领土进入。他们可能会反对我的出现，也可能不会反对，但我知道他们用黄金作为他们的滑稽货币，我不可能在他们不注意的情况下运出大量的黄金。所以，在我看来，我得到了一辈子的财富还有一堵墙。看来我需要一个大钻头。科恩没有提出任何进入的建议，也不想和这次行动有任何关系，这是他的损失。不过他确实想要5000块。问题是，他对我一点也不忠诚，他是个自私自利的小黄鼠狼，我敢拿我的生命打赌，他也会把这些信息卖给其他人。考虑到这一点，我省下了钱，朝他脑袋开了一枪。所以，下一步就是组建一个团队。
条目3
好吧，我从老家找了一个小团队。那个该死的白痴戴夫就是其中之一，但我会让他远离思考工作。问题是，要穿过那个金库可不容易，几个人用鹤嘴锄和大锤敲打它，但他们甚至连把墙敲凹都做不到。得想个新计划。
条目4
好吧，这才像话。我他妈买了一大堆炸药，C4很贵，但炸药是免费的，因为我们给炸药帮提供子弹。如果这些还不够，我还把我25岁生日时我奶奶给我的迷你核弹扔在了这堆东西上面。感谢奶奶！是时候开始了，希望没人破坏派对，如果不是因为该死的戴夫，这根本不是问题。那个混蛋想从蛾摩拉的妓女那里得到免费的东西，他告诉她:“我的朋友麦克在河的另一边发现了一个巨大的战前宝库！”我开始觉得那些关于他父母是兄弟姐妹的谣言是完全正确的，当他把我们的计划告诉一个妓女时，他想到的唯一的谎言就是他和我是“兄弟”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blind Henry
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞎子亨利

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Blind Henry
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "I had a caravan heading up to Jacobstown a while back, but they never made it there, and we couldn't fine them anywhere. Until, by the side of the road, the heads of all my men showed up, mounted on spikes, with their eyes gouged out. Asked around, and it sounds like this sick motherfucker likes to drag travelers into the mountains, so he can torture them to death."
Additional Notes: I can't find any more information on who this psychopath is, but apparently he really is blind. Someone took his eyes out, so now he does the same to other people, only he takes his sweet time with killing them. Best put him down, before he becomes some stupid urban legend.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：瞎子亨利
客户:匿名
签约理由:“前阵子，我有一个商队要去雅各布斯镇，但他们从来没到过那里，我们也找不到他们。直到，在路边，我手下的头出现了，被钉在尖刺上，眼睛被挖了出来。到处打听，听起来好像这个变态喜欢把旅行者拖到山里，然后折磨他们至死。”
附加说明：我找不到更多关于这个疯子是谁的信息，但显然他真的是瞎了。有人挖出了他的眼睛，所以他现在也对别人做同样的事，只是他很从容地杀了他们。最好在他变成什么愚蠢的都市传奇之前干掉他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodean, Bubba
ESP.TRADUIT: 布巴·博代安

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Bubba Bodean
Client: Ryan O'Neill
Reason for Contract: "So, we're cleaning up the Mojave, huh? Well, the first step should be clearing the way for travelers and merchants. There's a psycho family hiding up in the hills up North of Vegas, and they don't take kindly to outsiders "trespassing" on "their" land. Seems to me that the best way to put them out of commission would be to kill the patriarch of the family, Big Bubba Bodean. That said, I doubt anyone would care if you trimmed his family tree, too."
Additional Notes: On the subject of the Bodean family tree, it looks to me like the thing may not be really branch out of the family, if you know what I mean?
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：布巴·博代安
客户:瑞安·奥尼尔
签约理由：“那么，我们正在清理莫哈韦沙漠，对吧？”嗯，第一步应该是为旅客和商人扫清道路。在维加斯北部的山上有一个神经病家庭，他们不喜欢外人“侵入”他们的土地。在我看来，最好的办法就是杀掉这个家族的老大，大布巴·博代安。也就是说，我怀疑没有人会在意你是否也修剪他的家谱。”
附加说明：关于博代安家谱的问题，在我看来，它可能不是真正的家族分支，如果你懂我意思的话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Davis, Daniel
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹尼尔·戴维斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Daniel "The Duck" Davis
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "He killed my sister with an OD. If it was just an accident, fine, I could let it go. But I've been asking around, and it seems like way too many of this prick's customers are dropping dead. I don't know if his chemist is incompetent, or if he's cutting his shit with drain cleaner, or what. All I know is he has a debt that needs to be settled."
Additional Notes: Couldn't find much on this guy. Not even the origin of his nickname, which is the only thing I'm actually interested in.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名："鸭子"丹尼尔·戴维斯
客户:匿名
签约理由:“他用药物过量杀死了我妹妹。如果只是个意外，好吧，我可以不去管它。但我四处打听了一下，似乎这个混蛋的很多客户都死了。我不知道是他的药剂师不称职，还是他在用下水道清洁剂清理他的粪便。我只知道他有一笔债务需要偿还。”
附加说明：在这家伙身上找不到什么线索。甚至连他绰号的来源都不知道，这是我唯一感兴趣的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodsprings Gary
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇加里

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: "Goodsprings Gary"
Client: Big Pat
Reason for Contract: "He's trying to set up his own radio station, where he'll play the exact same repetitive songs as the other two stations out here. He needs to die screaming."
Additional Notes: I fucking hate the radio. The two stations we get have about fifteen songs between the both of them, and they've never once even tried to scavenge anything new. If this Gary motherfucker is trying to add another identical station to the mix, then he's as bad as Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：“清泉镇加里”
客户：大帕特
签约原因：“他正在尝试建立自己的广播电台，在那里他将播放与这里的两个电台完全相同的重复歌曲。他应该尖叫着死去。”
附加说明：我他妈的讨厌电台。我们收到的两个电台有大约15首歌曲，而且他们从来没有尝试过寻找新的东西。如果这个混蛋加里想再增加一个相同的电台，那么他就和凯撒一样坏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Communal Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 公共通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I need me some gun oil, goddamn shotgun keeps jamming up on me. -Betty Lou
The Bodeans will rule the world! - Jimmy Mack
The Bodeans will rule the world! - Dicky Joe
Got me a hog-tied outsider I dragged over here. If anyone wants to join in, I'm gonna strap him to the shooting range, and I'm gonna have plenty to drink! -Bucky Bob
The Bodeans will rule the world! - Uncle Teddie
Bucky Bob's funeral is today. No need for formal wear, but make sure y'all bring your guns and ammo for our 73-gun salute. Moonshine will be served after the ceremony. - Big Bubba
Bucky Bob was my favoritest brother. Who's gonna take care of me when I get all lonely now? -Dorie Lynn
I'll be your new best brother, Dorie Lynn. You'll never be lonely with me. I'll give you lots of baby Bodeans. -Billy Lee
The Bodeans will rule the world! -Ricky Ray
If anyone finds any 40mm grenades, toss 'em my way and I'll make sure you don't go thirsty. If I get lots of extra ammo for my grenade-launcher, I'll name her Bobbi Sue. -Robbie Earl
ESP.TRADUIT:
我需要点枪油，该死的猎枪老是卡住。
- 贝蒂·卢
博代安家族将统治世界！
- 吉米·马克
博代安家族将统治世界！
- 迪基·乔
给我找了个被绑住的外来者。如果有人想加入，我就把他绑到射击场去，我要喝很多酒！
- 巴基·鲍勃
博代安家族将统治世界!
- 泰迪叔叔
今天是巴基·鲍勃的葬礼。不需要穿正装，但请带上你们的枪和弹药，迎接我们的73响礼炮。仪式结束后将提供私酿烈酒。
- 大布巴
巴基·鲍勃是我最喜欢的弟弟。我现在孤单的时候谁还会来照顾我？
- 多莉·林恩
我会是你新兄弟，多莉·林恩。和我在一起你永远不会孤独。我会给你很多小博代安。
- 比利·李
博代安家族将统治世界！
- 瑞奇·雷
如果有人发现40毫米手榴弹，扔到我这边，我保证你不会口渴。如果我的榴弹发射器有足够的弹药，我就叫她波比·苏。
- 罗比·厄尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodean Family History
ESP.TRADUIT: 博代安家族史

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For over three centuries, we Bodeans have been the most illustrious and pure-blooded family on the planet. From the swamps of Point Lookout on the East, to the luxurious Salton Sea Budget Trailer Park on the West, we Bodeans have held sway wherever banjos and gunfire could be heard in the distance.
Our great success can be traced back to two sources. First, unlike the other degenerate families infesting this country, we Bodeans have kept our bloodlines pure and untainted for over 300 years, back when our great ancestor, Bobby Ray Bodean, realized that no woman could usurp the position that his beloved sister, Tammy Jo, held in his heart. From that day forward, we have followed his heroic example, and refused to allow the filthy blood of outsiders to mix with our own.
Secondly, we have long maintained the secret recipe to the best moonshine in the entire universe. An elixir so deeply ingrained in the history of our glorious dynasty that all Bodeans are made to memorize every detail of the formula, so as to contribute to our ever-expanding success. On the eve of their tenth birthday, each and every Bodean is given the holy task of preparing a batch of moonshine, without assistance or supervision. Those who fail are exiled, so as to not weaken our line with their weakness. While our moonshine is greatly coveted by the filthy legions of outsiders, they may never be permitted to learn the secrets of our recipe.
(The document continues on in this fashion for an additional 86 pages, and you cannot will yourself to read any further.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
三百多年来，我们博代安家族一直是这个星球上最杰出最纯种的家族。从东部的望海崖沼泽地，到西部豪华的索尔顿海廉价拖车公园，只要能听到班卓琴和枪声的地方，我们博代安家族就占据了统治地位。
我们的巨大成功有两个原因。首先，不像其他在这个国家横行的堕落家族，我们博代安家族三百多年来一直保持着血统的纯洁无瑕，追溯到我们的祖先，鲍比·雷·博代安，他意识到没有女人能取代他深爱的妹妹，塔米·乔在他心中的地位。从那天起，我们就跟随他的英雄榜样，拒绝让外来者的肮脏血液混入我们之中。
其次，我们一直保存着全宇宙最好的私酿烈酒的秘方。这是一种在我们辉煌王朝的历史中根深蒂固的灵丹妙药，所有的博代安成员都被要求记住配方的每一个细节，从而为我们不断扩大的成功做出贡献。在他们十岁生日的前夕，每一个博代安人都被赋予了一项神圣的任务:在没有帮助和监督的情况下准备一批私酿烈酒。失败的人被流放，以免他们的弱点削弱我们的路线。虽然我们的私酿烈酒被肮脏的外来者觊觎，但他们可能永远不会被允许知道我们的秘方。
(该文档以这种方式继续延伸了86页，你无法再读下去了。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 订单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've given you a minimal background and identity. For the remainder of this operation, you're Danny "The Duck" Davis. Feel free to make up your own story for the nickname.
We've got you three full crates of confiscated chems, one third (1/3) of which have been cut with various compounds, designed to kill the user in a manner that suggests an overdose. You will distribute these in the Outer Vegas region, at a significantly reduced price compared to other nearby dealers. The primary objective, of course, being to do as much damage as we can to this infestation of junkies and lunatics.
There is also a secondary objective, which is apparently considered optional and low-priority. I would disagree, and heavily suggest you move forward with it. If possible, try and earn the trust of your customers. Try and angle this into gaining access to Vault 3, where you can distribute directly to the Fiends at the source. If it works out, we may very well eliminate the gang from the inside.
Your friend Harper
ESP.TRADUIT:
我已经给了你一个最基本的背景和身份。这次行动剩下的时间里，你就是"鸭子"丹尼·戴维斯。你可以随意为这个昵称编个故事。
我们为你准备了三箱没收的化学药品，其中三分之一是用各种化合物合成的，目的是让使用者死于过量用药。你将在外维加斯地区分发这些，与附近的其他经销商相比，价格显著降低。当然，我们的首要目标是尽可能多地破坏这种瘾君子和疯子的泛滥。
还有一个次要目标，虽然它被认为是可选的，优先级较低。但我不这么认为，我强烈建议你继续做下去。如果可能的话，努力赢得客户的信任。试着进入3号避难所，在那里你可以直接分发给源头的恶魔帮。如果成功了，我们很有可能从内部消灭这个团伙。
你的朋友 - 哈珀

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fleece
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗利斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Fleece
Client: Dave Sipowicz, Gun Runners
Reason for Contract: "Some Fiend actually has the technical know-how and the physical resources to manufacture his own high-end weapons. This is unacceptable, and he needs to be taken out, immediately."
Additional Notes: Some people might have put a contract on this guy's head because anyone arming the Fiends is a danger to society. Not the Gun Runners, though.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称：弗利斯
客户：戴夫·西波维茨，军火贩子
签约理由：“有些恶魔帮实际上拥有制造自己的高端武器的技术诀窍和物质资源。这是不可接受的，他必须立即被除掉。”
附加说明：有些人可能会给这个家伙的头开出合同，因为任何武装恶魔帮的人对社会都是危险的。但不是枪支走私者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ross, Jared
ESP.TRADUIT: 贾里德·罗斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Jared Ross
Client: Crimson Caravan
Reason for Contract: "This lunatic is perched on top of a billboard by the 188, blasting anyone and anything that comes nearby. He's derailing the merchants and costing us cash and resources."
Additional Notes: Looks like Ross here was a First Recon sharpshooter, before he got dishonorably discharged for being a bloodthirsty psychopath. I guess he got a taste for blood when he was shooting women and kids during that Bitter Springs debacle. Be careful, the guy's a crack shot in an elevated position.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：贾里德·罗斯
客户:深红商队
签约理由:“这个疯子站在188号公路旁的广告牌边上，对任何靠近的人或任何东西开火。他让我们损失现金和资源。”
附加说明：听说罗斯原来是第一侦察营的神枪手，后来因为嗜血和精神变态被开除了。我猜他是在苦泉镇的那场灾难中向妇女和孩子开枪时染上了血的味道。小心，这家伙在高处而且是个神枪手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Words
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I thought I was trained to kill raiders and the Brotherhood and shit like that. They taught me I had to obey without question or hesitation. Then they told me that I had to shoot the people trying to escape Bitter Springs. I killed as many as I could. Old people, kids. I shot a woman carrying a baby in her arms. I wanted to serve my country, and they made me a murderer. They ruined me. I don't feel anything anymore. I have tried drinking and chems and whores and it's all nothing. I can't stand looking at people anymore. They're living their shallow happy lives because of all the sacrifices they forced me to make. There's nothing left for me, and I'm ending it. I will take as many of them with me as I can. When there is a mountain of corpses and you want to know who to blame, look west. They're the ones who made me.
Tell my brother I'm sorry.
Jared Ross
ESP.TRADUIT:
我一直以为我的训练是用来干掉掠夺者和兄弟会的，他们教我必须毫不犹豫地服从。然后呢，他们告诉我，我必须射杀那些试图逃离苦泉镇的人，我杀了尽可能多的人。包括老人,孩子。我还枪杀了一个怀里抱着婴儿的女人。我想为我的国家服务，他们却把我变成了杀人犯。他们毁了我。我什么感觉都没有了。我试过喝酒，嗑药，嫖妓，但都没什么。我再也受不了看别人了。他们过着幸福的生活就因为他们强迫我做出的牺牲。我一无所有了，我要结束这一切，我会尽可能多地带走他们。当尸体堆积如山，你想知道该怪谁时，向西看，是他们造就了我。
告诉我哥哥我很抱歉。
- 贾里德·罗斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lancaster, Grace
ESP.TRADUIT: 格蕾丝·兰开斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Grace Lancaster
Client: Anonymous
Reason for Contract: "Despite what this format implies, I don't want Grace harmed in any way. She's being held for ransom in a whorehouse to the south. Between her kidnappers, whorehouse security, and her dad's thugs, things will probably get very messy. Can't get into the details, but it would be bad if her father's people extracted her. Much better for a neutral party to kill everyone and cut her loose."
Additional Notes: Good news, you get paid to visit a brothel. Bad news, no whores inside. Just gunmen. Go save the girl and be a hero, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：格蕾丝·兰开斯特
客户:匿名
签约理由:“不管这种形式意味着什么，我不希望格蕾丝受到任何伤害。她被关在南边的一家妓院里勒索赎金。有绑匪，妓院保安，还有她爸爸的手下，事情可能会变得一团糟。不能细说，但如果她父亲的人把她带走了那就糟了。由一个中立方来杀了所有人，然后把她放走，那就好得多了。"
附加说明：好消息是，你去妓院是有报酬的。坏消息是，里面没有妓女，只有枪手。去救那个女孩，做个英雄吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hayes, Jeff
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰夫·海耶斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Jefferson Hayes
Client: New Vegas Merchants Union
Reason for Contract: "We had a caravan pass by Boulder City, like we've done a thousand times before. This time, someone hiding in a building sniped our Brahmin. These bandits came out and they started looting our cargo. They burned the caravan guard alive, but they let the merchant go, after they took turns raping her several times. We know that Hayes is responsible, and we want him dead."
Additional Notes: Hayes is a violent reprobate. He got banned from the Big Horn Saloon for being a drunken ass. You know someone's a cunt if a dying business would rather toss 'em out than take their money.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：杰佛逊·海耶斯
客户：新维加斯商人联盟
签约理由:“我们有一个车队经过巨石城，就像我们之前做过上千次一样。这次，有人躲在一栋楼里狙击了我们的婆罗门，然后这些强盗出来开始抢劫我们的货物。他们活活烧死了商队的守卫，但他们放走了商人，在他们轮流强奸了她几次之后。我们知道是海耶斯干的，我们想要他死。”
附加说明：海耶斯是一个暴力的恶棍。他因为是个醉鬼而被大角沙龙禁止入内，如果一个濒临倒闭的企业宁愿把他们扔出去也不收他们的钱，你就知道某人是个傻逼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking Clown!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的小丑！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Pervert Clown Fuck
Client: Ted Stevenson
Reason for Contract: "You would not believe what I done seen! A goddamn sickass clown, running around North Vagas (sic) and killing the women and the kids with his clown knife! I seen him, and I need a hero to come and kill that fucking clown!!"
Additional Notes: I'm not sure where this drunk got the cash to afford a contract, but fuck it. I'm all for one less clown in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：该死的变态小丑
客户：泰德·史蒂文森
签约理由：“你不会相信我看到了什么！一个该死的变态小丑，在北维加斯跑来跑去，用他的小丑刀杀了女人和孩子！我看到他了，我需要一个英雄来杀了那个该死的小丑！！”
附加说明：我不知道这醉汉哪来的钱签合同，他妈的无所谓。我很赞成少一个小丑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Territory Solution
ESP.TRADUIT: 领土解决方案

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, Eugene.
I suppose I didn't quite consider that your territory is as wide and expansive as it was. You must have known this already, considering what happened when my men encountered yours. But I received your message, loud and clear.
You want me to stay out of your territory, and for the crime of hanging your associates, you want me to send a small percentage of my revenue to you for as long as I stay in the slave trade. It was a clever tactic, sending your demands with that large mutant associate of yours. You're probably wondering where he went, and why this message arrived with my own courier?
Yes, your mutant was very intimidating, but it undercuts your whole point if I have a perfectly human associate that is bigger and stronger. I let him off his leash and I'm sad to say that he broke your mutant's limbs, and gouged out his eyes, and chewed off his tongue. There's not a doubt in my mind that he would have raped your mutant, too, if we didn't have a busy schedule.
You wanted a percentage of my earnings? I earn in blood, you little parasite. Scraping for cash, dipping your tongue in the NCR's cunt, telling the world that you're worth more than an errant thought. It's all very cute. You know what else is cute? The sounds your daughter and her husband and your grandkids made, when we barricaded their door and burned them alive inside the house you bought for them. Go and see it, if you doubt me.
Your brother Gary wasn't very cute, at least not what was left after I skinned him alive. You should have heard how his son howled from the cage we kept him in, watching over the whole affair. I don't know if you were close to your nephew, but I fed him to our dogs all the same. It seems you're the only Schrader still alive. Sorry about that. Did you still want a percentage of my earnings?
Sheridan
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，尤金。
我没有想到你的工作领域如此广阔。你肯定已经知道了我的人遇到你的人时发生的事。但我收到了你的信息，一清二楚。
你想让我远离你的地盘，因为我绞死了你的同伙，你想让我在奴隶交易期间把我收入的一小部分给你。这是个聪明的策略，把你的要求和你的变种人同伙一起发出去。你可能想知道他去哪了，为什么这条消息是由我的信使送来的?
是的，你的变种人很吓人，但如果我有一个更大更强的完美人类伙伴呢？很遗憾地告诉你，他折断了你的变种人的四肢，挖出了他的眼睛，咬掉了他的舌头。我想他肯定也会强奸你的变种人，如果我们不是很忙的话。
你想从我的收入中提成？我靠血赚钱。不像你这个寄生虫，偷窃，对NCR的婊子吐舌头，告诉全世界你比一个错误的想法更有价值。这一切都很可爱。你知道还有什么很可爱吗？你女儿和她丈夫还有你的孙子们，在你给他们买的房子里，我们堵住他们的门活活烧死他们时发出的声音。如果你怀疑我，就去看看。
你弟弟加里不怎么可爱，至少我活剥了他的皮之后他就不可爱了。你真该听听他儿子在我们关着他的笼子里嚎叫的样子，看着整个事件发生。我不知道你和你侄子是否亲近，但我还是把他喂给我们的狗吃。看来你是唯一一个还活着的施拉德尔。很抱歉。不知道你还想从我的收入中提成吗？
- 谢里丹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Busta Nutt 3 Script
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴斯塔·纳特3号脚本

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Chunks, listen man, you're not in the Legion. That's just a character you play. We can arrange a better paycheck for you. I know Alberta was real mad, but I can calm him down. Look, if you walk out on this studio, we'll have to give this script to someone else. Think about what you could miss out on! Just take a look and see what you think.
Busta Nutt: Cops on the Edge, starring Chunks Woodcock as Busta Nutt, Jerome Huge as Harding, and Janet Jake as Chief Puss.
Open on Busta Nutt having threeway with some girls. The phone rings and Busta answers it without stopping his sex. It's the voice of Captain Harding.
Harding: Busta, there's a case we need you for. Come to the precinct now.
Busta: I'm in a bit of a sticky situation, captain. (BUSTA WINKS AT CAMERA)
Harding: Damn it Busta, you don't play by the rules, and I disapprove!
Busta finishes his sex with both girls at once. Cut to Busta down at the police station.
Harding: Busta, someone has blown up the orphanage where you grew up. All the orphans died.
Busta: Fuck!
Harding: It is the work of the Puss Gang and their new boss, Chief Puss. She is an escaped criminal with a record.
Busta: Sounds like this Puss needs a pounding of justice. And this time it is personal.
A sexy female traffic cop comes into the office.
Sexy Cop: Captain, I have a report for you.
Harding and Busta smile at each other with respect.
Busta: Officer, me and the captain will have to inspect you as part of the new policy.
Harding: It's a strip search.
Harding tears his pants off. (They will be tearaways for this) All three of them have sex, but Busta and Harding don't do anything with each other because they're not gay. They just have sex with the woman, and avoid eye contact.
Cut to Busta Nutt, who is tied up and Chief Puss is standing there.
Puss: It looks like Detective Nutt is all tied up at the moment.
Busta: I know a way out of this.
Busta flexes and breaks the rope.
Busta: Sorry, I like to play loose.
Chief Puss takes off her top.
Busta: I must be a farmer, because I'm going to plow you.
They have the best sex scene in the movie. After it is finished we cut back to the police office.
Harding: Good job Nutt. You have solved the case. But Chief Puss was just found innocent at court and she is free now.
Nutt: Don't worry Captain, even if she is free, I will make sure that she does her time. HARD time.
END
ESP.TRADUIT:
大块头，听着，你不是真正的军团，那只是你扮演的一个角色。我们可以给你安排更好的薪水。我知道阿尔伯塔很生气，但我能让他冷静下来。听着，如果你离开了演播室，我们就得把剧本交给别人了。想想你会错过什么！看看你是怎么想的。
巴斯塔·纳特：边缘警察，大块头伍德考克饰演巴斯塔·纳特，杰罗姆·赫格饰演哈丁，珍妮特·杰克饰演猫长官。
开场：巴斯塔·纳特和几个女孩正在玩3P。这时电话铃响了，巴斯塔接了电话但并没有停止他的性爱。这是哈丁队长打来的。
哈丁：巴斯塔，我们有个案子需要你，你现在就到警局来。
巴斯塔：我的处境有点棘手，队长。(巴斯塔对着镜头眨了眨眼睛)
哈丁：该死，巴斯塔，你不按规矩办事，我不同意！
巴斯塔同时和两个女孩做爱。接着巴斯塔来到警察局。
哈丁：巴斯塔，有人炸掉了你长大的孤儿院。所有的孤儿都死了。
巴斯塔：操！
哈丁：这是“猫帮”和他们的新老板“猫长官”干的。她是一名有前科的逃犯。
巴斯塔：听起来这只猫需要正义的打击。这次是私人恩怨。
一个性感的女警走进办公室。
性感警察：警监，我有一份报告给你。
哈丁和巴斯塔互相尊重地微笑着。
巴斯塔：警官，根据新政策，我和队长必须对你进行检查。
哈丁：这是脱衣搜查。
哈丁脱下了裤子，他们三个发生了性关系，但是巴斯塔和哈丁没有和对方做任何事情，因为他们不是同性恋。他们只是和女人做爱，避免眼神接触。
镜头切换到巴斯塔·纳特，他被绑着，猫长官站在那里。
猫：看起来纳特警探现在很忙。
巴斯塔：我知道一个解决办法。
巴斯塔弯下腰，把绳子弄断了。
巴斯塔：对不起，我喜欢放松。
猫长官脱下了上衣。
巴斯塔：我一定是个农民，因为我要为你犁地。
然后是电影里最棒的性爱场面。这一段结束后，切回了警察局。
哈丁：干得好，纳特，你已经破案了。但是猫长官刚在法庭上被判无罪，现在她自由了。
纳特：别担心，上校，即使她无罪，我也会让她服完刑的。艰难时期。
结束

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folded Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 折叠的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear Mr. Snyder
Thank you for your continued interest in employment opportunities at Alberta Studios. However, we regret to inform you that we still aren't interested in hiring some stupid kid based on nothing more than the fact that you live "around da block" and you "have had some serious banging in your life".
If you attempt to enter our premises again, I will have the Mastodonic Mutant throw you through a window. A glass window.
Sincerely Benny Alberta, world's best director
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的斯奈德先生
感谢您对阿尔伯塔工作室就业机会的持续兴趣。然而，我们很遗憾地通知你，我们仍然没有兴趣雇用一个愚蠢的孩子，仅仅因为你住在“我们的街区”，而且“在你的生活中有一些严重的碰撞”。
如果你再试图进入我们的地盘，我就让乳齿象变种人把你从窗户扔出去。一个玻璃窗口。
真诚的， - 本尼·阿尔伯塔，世界最佳导演

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chris Blue
ESP.TRADUIT: 克里斯·布鲁

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Chris "Blue"
Client: Great Khans
Reason for Contract: "This jerkoff comes into the Mojave with his fancy fucking degrees and education from the NCR, and tries to muscle in on our turf? There's no room for independent chemists running around. Get rid of him."
Additional Notes: They probably mean dead, but their vague word choice means that I'll accept it as a job well done if you just convince him to leave. Or you could kill him. I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：克里斯 "布鲁"
客户:大汗帮
签约理由：“这个混球带着他那该死的NCR学位和教育来到莫哈韦沙漠，想要强行占领我们的地盘？没有地方让独立的化学家到处乱跑。把他赶走。”
附加说明：他们的意思可能是干掉他，但他们含糊的措辞意味着，如果你能说服他离开，我会把它当作一项出色的工作来接受。或者你可以杀了他，我也不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Liddel, Mackenzie
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦肯齐·利德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Mackenzie "Mac" Liddel
Client: Sandy Shore Financial Consulting
Reason for Contract: "Liddel is attempting to steal our property."
Additional Notes: The money-men are never okay with other people trying to get money. Funny, that.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：麦肯齐·麦克·利德尔
客户：砂质海岸金融咨询
签约理由：“利德尔试图窃取我们的财产。”
附加说明：有钱人们从来不会同意其他人试图赚钱，有趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mays, Joseph
ESP.TRADUIT: 约瑟夫·梅斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Joseph Mays
Client: Anthony Jr.
Reason for Contract: "I don't want to go into details, but this Mays guy is a scammer and I lost a bunch of money to him, and I thought it was a good investment, but I'm pretty sure he ripped me off, 'cause the NCR says the deed to camp McCarran that Mays sold me is a fake, and they didn't leave even though I'm the new owner of the airport. Can you get him out of the Mojave please?"
Additional Notes: A con artist in Vegas. What a fucking twist. You can ice the guy, or just talk him into leaving peacefully. As always, I don't give a shit.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：约瑟夫·梅斯
客户：小安东尼
签约理由：“我不想说细节，但这个叫梅斯的人是一个骗子，我被他骗了很多钱，我以为这是一个很好的投资，但我很确定他骗了我的钱，因为NCR说梅斯卖给我的麦卡伦营地地契是假的，即使我现在是机场的新主人他们也没有离开。你能把他赶出莫哈韦吗？”
附加说明：一个在维加斯的骗子，真他妈的扭曲。你可以让他变成一具冰冷的尸体，也可以平静地说服他离开。一如既往，我不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scrawled Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 潦草的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Charlie, I got a bunch of those weird chemicals on your list. You're sure this shit will get us high? I feel like snorting abraxo will just make my heart explode.
-JJ
You don't snort the abraxo. Don't snort anything, except maybe the vapors from the turpentine. Jansen says you can get high off that shit. If you can find some gasoline, make that a priority. Spray paint is good too, especially the metallic gold or silver ones.
Charlie!
I found a bottle of that steel-blueing stuff. Should I leave that in the closet, too?
-JJ
Worth a shot.
Charlie!
Did you bang someone in here? I stepped in a puddle of something, and it better not be what I think it is.
-JJ
Why were you in the inhalant closet without shoes on?
Charlie!
ESP.TRADUIT:
查理，你的清单上有一堆奇怪的化学物质。你确定这玩意能让我们嗑嗨吗？我觉得用鼻子吸阿伯莱萨只会让我的心脏爆炸。
- JJ
你不要吸阿伯莱萨，别吸任何东西，除了松节油的蒸汽，詹森说那东西能让你嗨起来。如果你能找到汽油，优先考虑。喷漆也不错，尤其是金属金或银的。
- 查理！
我找到一瓶那种钢青色的东西。我应该把那个也放在壁橱里吗？
- JJ
值得一试。
- 查理！
你在这里上了什么人吗？我踩到一滩东西，最好不是我想的那样。
- JJ
你为什么不穿鞋就待在吸入器柜里?
- 查理！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forged NCR Records
ESP.TRADUIT: 伪造的NCR记录

ESP.ORIGINAL: A stack of personal records purporting to be from the NCR. Closer examination reveals that they are actually forgeries of middling quality. The listed names seem improbable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一堆自称是NCR的个人记录。仔细检查发现它们实际上是质量中等的赝品。所列的名字似乎不可能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Longbush, Jeremiah
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶利米·朗布什

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Jeremiah Longbush
Client: Adolf Hitler
Reason for Contract: "Me and my family were desperate to get away from the Legion, so we tried to buy fake documentation from Longbush so we could get into the NCR. He charged a ridiculous fee, and then he told me my new name was fucking Adolf Hitler, as per the ID he forged. I could let all of this go, except his garbage IDs and birth certificates didn't even fool the guys at the Mojave Outpost!"
Additional Notes: When you kill Longbush, you should puff your chest out and announce: "I did this for you, Adolf Hitler!"
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：耶利米·朗布什
客户：阿道夫·希特勒
签约原因:“我和我的家人非常想离开军团，所以我们试图从朗布什那里购买伪造的文件，这样我们就可以进入NCR。他收取了一笔荒谬的费用，然后他告诉我我的新名字是阿道夫·希特勒，根据他伪造的身份证。我可以让这一切都过去，除了他的垃圾身份证和出生证明连莫哈韦哨岗的人都骗不到！”
附加说明：当你杀死朗布什时，你应该挺胸宣布:“我这么做是为了你，阿道夫·希特勒！”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coffee-Stained Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 染上咖啡渍的信

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not looking for anything specific, Pat. Just keep those rheumy little eyes of yours open, in case anything noteworthy happens. I don't care about the comings and goings of whores and junkies, I just want to know the sorts of things that strike you as odd. If it leaves an impression on you, you let me know. I'll keep paying you the flat rate, plus a little extra for anything valid that you report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是在找什么特别的东西，帕特。睁着你那双风湿的小眼睛，以防有什么大事发生。我不在乎妓女和瘾君子的来来去去，我只想知道你觉得奇怪的事情是什么。如果你对它有印象，就告诉我。我会继续按统一费用付钱给你，并为你你举报的任何有效的问题额外支付一些费用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get it working!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让它工作！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm going to set up shop in that abandoned Lone Wolf Radio outpost. They should have everything I need. I need you to find a way to get Goodsprings Gary in the Morning FM on the air. I don't care if you have to build a radio tower, or blow a robot, or whatever, but get it done! If those mutants at Black Mountain can get their station live, than we gotta be able to do it. Just do your magical science nerd shit!
Gary
ESP.TRADUIT:
我要在那个废弃的孤狼电台前哨开张，那里应该有我需要的一切。我需要你想办法让清泉镇加里在晨间调频上播出。我不在乎你是要建一个无线电塔，还是炸掉一个机器人，或者其他什么，但一定要完成它！如果黑山的那些变种人能够让他们的电台直播，那么我们也一定能够做到。做你的魔法科学呆子去吧！
- 加里

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bennet Jr.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小班内特

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Bennet Jr.
Client: Miguel Hernandez
Reason for Contract: "This junkie asshole got my daughter hooked on chems when they were dating. When we took her to the Followers for rehab, he stole everything in our home that wasn't nailed down, probably sold it to buy more jet. Enough is enough."
Additional Notes: As far as I can tell, Jr. isn't affiliated with any gangs or organizations. Just a lone junkie, without anyone to protect him from you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：小班内特
客户：米格尔·埃尔南德斯
签约原因：“这个瘾君子在约会时让我女儿染上了毒瘾。当我们带她去天启追随者那里进行康复治疗时，他偷走了我们家里所有没有钉牢的东西，可能已经被他用来买更多的杰特了。 该适可而止了。”
附加说明：据我所知，小班内特不隶属于任何帮派或组织。 只是一个孤独的瘾君子，没有人保护他免受你的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: FAQ Section
ESP.TRADUIT: FAQ部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Q: Why am I only permitted to have one contract at a time? I'm a globe-trotting badass, and it would be more expedient if I just had a giant stack of contracts.
A: Some people are greedy and stupid, and would snatch up all the contracts in the place, and then never actually complete any of them. Bad for business.
Q: Why do we need to pay you for a mission, Joe Tully?
A: To disincentivize the aforementioned greedy dumbasses hogging contracts without completing them. Take your target out, and you get your investment back, plus extra. Be a lazy ass, and you're just losing your own money.
Q: I wanted a specific contract, but I'm told someone already took it out. Why can't multiple contractors take on a single target?
A: My contractors kill people for money. Some of them wouldn't hesitate to kill their competition so they can claim the reward themselves. That ain't feasible if each contract is attached to a specific contractor.
Q: I have moral reservations about killing. How do I know you don't target innocent people?
A: Because it costs money to contract an assassination. No one is going to throw their own money away to have me kill some innocent person for shits and giggles. If you got a price on your head, it means you did something to warrant it.
Q: How would I go about bringing a target in alive?
A: You wouldn't. We're not bounty hunters. Unless otherwise specified, you kill your targets, nothing more.
Q: Do you require proof of death?
A: Yes and no. I'm not handing over a single half-cap without verification that the target died, but I have well-placed people who will do the verifying for me. You don't have to do shit, except for actually killing the marks.
Q: How do you know where the targets are?
A: I have sources. Considering that the intel these sources send me is the cornerstone for the success of my business, I won't say anything more on that front.
ESP.TRADUIT:
问：为什么我一次只能有一份合同？我是个周游世界的恶人，如果我有一大堆合同会更有利。
答：有些人既贪婪又愚蠢，他们会把所有的合同都抢走，但实际上却一份也没有完成。对企业不利。
问：乔·塔利，我们为什么要付钱给你执行任务？
答：为了阻止前面提到的那些贪婪的傻瓜们不完成合同就霸占合同。除掉你的目标，你就能收回投资，外加额外的回报。做个懒人，你只会损失你自己的钱。
问：我想要一个具体的合同，但我被告知有人已经把它拿出来了。为什么不让多个承包人共同对付一个目标呢？
答：我的承包人都是为了钱来杀人的。他们中的一些人会毫不犹豫地扼杀竞争对手，以便自己获得奖励。如果每个合同都附属于一个特定的承包商，那就不会发生了。。
问：我对杀戮有道德上的保留，我怎么知道你不会针对无辜的人？
答：因为暗杀是要花钱的。没人会把自己的钱浪费在让我杀掉无辜的人上。如果有人悬赏要你的人头，那说明你做了什么值得的事。
问：我该如何把一个目标活着带回来？
答：你不需要，我们不是赏金猎人。除非有特别说明，否则你只需要杀了你的目标，仅此而已。
问：你需要死亡证明吗？
答：是也不是。我不会在没有确认目标死亡的情况下交出一分钱，但我有合适的人可以帮我核实。你什么都不用做，只要杀了目标就行。
问：你怎么知道目标在哪里？
答：我有消息来源。考虑到这些消息来源提供给我的情报是我事业成功的基石，我就不再多说了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find interesting people
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找有趣的人

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Clancy, I'm sending Morton with you. He'll help back you up and enforce your will, but you may start to loathe his presence after he helps himself to your comelier captives. Be that as it may, I want him back in one piece.
I'm bored with these locals that we've been rounding up. I was cast out of the Mojave, but why hoard all the fun? Let's bring some of their people up to experience northern hospitality. NCR troops or Rangers would be very interesting. I don't like the notion that they're trying to forget me. That isn't wise. The storm can blow in when you least expect it, and before you know it, your family is drowning and your friends are burning alive.
Bitter Springs is an NCR refugee camp. They're near enough to the north road, and they're not so well-guarded as it is. Get as many as you can, with your priority being military types. Don't be picky, though. Take anyone you can. Even a little grandpa could be entertaining, if not especially valuable.
Sheridan
ESP.TRADUIT:
克兰西，我让莫顿跟你一起去。他会支持你并执行你的意愿，但在他帮助你的漂亮俘虏之后，你可能会开始厌恶他的存在。尽管如此，我还是希望他能安然无恙地回来。
我已经厌倦了这些我们围捕的当地人。我被赶出了莫哈韦沙漠，但为什么要保留所有的乐趣呢？让我们把他们中的一些人带上来，体验一下北方的热情。NCR部队或游骑兵会很有趣，我不喜欢他们试图忘记我的想法。这不是明智的，暴风雨会在你最意想不到的时候袭来，在你意识到之前，你的家人被淹死了，你的朋友被活活烧死了。
苦泉是一个NCR难民营，他们离北方之路很近，而且守卫也不像现在这么严密。尽可能多的捕获，你的优先选择是军事类型。不过，不要太挑剔。带着所有你能带的人，即使不是特别有价值，一个小爷爷也会很有趣。
- 谢里丹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make some people cry
ESP.TRADUIT: 让一些人哭泣

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You're going to be following Clancy to the Mojave. I think they've been getting complacent without me there to serve as a role model and pillar of the community. Clancy knows the job details, all you need to do is follow his lead.
What's the fun in that, though? There's an NCR refugee camp close to where you'll enter the Mojave. Even closer, there's a Ranger station. Clancy will be taking captives, and you're not to break them before they can find their way to me. But you can't collar everyone, so anyone who isn't captured is yours to do with as you please. I want you to make them scream so loudly, that I'll be able to hear them begging for death up here. Make children weep in their mothers arms. You're a grown man, Morton. You know how to have fun without me holding the leash.
Sheridan
ESP.TRADUIT:
你要跟着克兰西到莫哈韦沙漠。我认为，没有我在那里作为社区的榜样和支柱，他们已经变得自满了。克兰西知道工作细节，你只要听他的就行了。
不过，这有什么好玩的呢？在你进入莫哈维的地方附近有一个NCR难民营。更近的地方，有一个游骑兵站。克兰西会抓俘虏，在他们找到我之前你不能让他们崩溃。但你不能把所有人都圈起来，所以没被抓的人都归你管，你可以随意处置。我要你让他们大声尖叫，让我能听到他们在这里求死的声音，让孩子们在母亲的怀抱里哭泣。你是个成年人了，莫顿，你知道不用我牵狗绳怎么找乐子。
- 谢里丹

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grambus
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰布斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Grambus
Client: Jerry T.
Reason for Contract: "The northeast area, near Bitter Springs, is pretty rough as-is. Bad enough to be surrounded by cazadors and fire geckos, with slavers always lurking around. Now there's some mutant freak hiding in that radioactive pit to the east of the camp, and he's making a habit of trying to murder and eat anyone he can get his big green hands on."
Additional Notes: If he's hanging out in a pit, it should be easy enough to perch on the edge and snipe him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：格兰布斯
客户：杰瑞·T。
签约理由：“东北地区，靠近苦泉，目前情况相当恶劣。被辐射蝇和火蜥蜴包围已经够糟糕了，还有奴隶贩子总是潜伏在周围。现在有个变异怪物躲在营地东边的放射性坑里，他养成了一个习惯，只要他的大手能抓到谁就想杀掉谁，吃掉谁。”
附加说明：如果他在一个坑里闲逛，你应该很容易栖息在边缘狙击他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grambus!
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰布斯 !

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Grambus, go to the radioactive pit near Bitter Springs! You will meet many friendly centaurs, and you shall become their new master!
Lead the centaurs to victory, Grambus! Destroy the filthy human race, and reign supreme! It is your destiny!
Sincerely, Grambus
ESP.TRADUIT:
格兰布斯，快去苦涩泉附近的放射性坑！你将遇到许多友好的半人马，你将成为他们的新主人！
带领半人马走向胜利，格兰布斯！摧毁肮脏的人类，统治世界！这是你的命运！
- 真诚的，格兰布斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moss, Clancy
ESP.TRADUIT: 克兰西·莫斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Clancy Moss
Client: Mr. Harper
Reason for Contract: "Moss is a slaver who answers directly to a deranged fugitive named Sheridan. Sheridan fled the Mojave when a crew of independent bounty hunters killed most of his men and burned his holdings to the foundations. If Sheridan is making overtures in the Mojave again, then let's repeat history. For now, that will have to begin with the violent death of Clancy Moss, and any associates he may have with him."
Additional Notes: I've worked together with Caleb Alquist, the bounty hunter that sent Sheridan running the first time. If Sheridan really is turning his gaze towards the Mojave again, then we need to remind him that he has no place here.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：克兰西·莫斯
客户：哈珀
签约理由:“莫斯是一个奴隶贩子，直接听命于一个叫谢里丹的疯狂逃犯。谢里丹之前逃离了莫哈韦沙漠，因为一群独立的赏金猎人杀死了他的大部分手下，把他的财产付之一炬。如果谢里丹又要在莫哈韦沙漠重新开展业务，那我们就重演历史。这必须从克兰西·莫斯的暴死开始，以及他可能的任何同伙。”
附加说明：我曾与凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特一起工作，他是第一次让谢里丹跑路的赏金猎人。如果谢里丹真的又盯上莫哈维沙漠了，那我们就得提醒他，他在这里没有立足之地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Note from Janet
ESP.TRADUIT: 珍妮特的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Real mature, Steven. I'm glad you and all your buddies are bonding while you share a needle or whatever you assholes do. Did you forget that we have a son, now? Are you just not going to provide for us anymore?
Janet
(Scribbled in a shaky hand at the bottom of the note) Fuck off woman!!
ESP.TRADUIT:
真正的成熟，斯蒂文。我很高兴你和你的朋友们在一起而你们俩却在一起打针。你忘了我们还有个儿子吗？你不打算养活我们了吗？
- 珍妮特
(用颤抖的手在纸条底部潦草地写着) 滚开女人！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Schrader, Eugene
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤金·施拉德尔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Eugene Schrader
Client: Roy Sullivan
Reason for Contract: "There's an elderly gentleman named Eugene Schrader, operating in a building on the outskirts of Westside. Mr. Schrader is, apparently, running some sort of slaving ring that preys upon the good people of Westside. He is also violently territorial, and has threatened me and my own businesses, for no greater reason than the fact that Mr. Schrader has claimed the entire region as his "turf" as he says. Ordinarily, I would have him quietly dealt with, but given the nature of Mr. Schrader's business, I do believe he should serve as a public example of why it's important to be a courteous neighbor."
Additional Notes: When he was in his prime, Schrader was actually something of a bad motherfucker. Nowadays, he's in over his head, and refusing to admit the reality of the situation. Slavers always deserve to die, so let's make him dead. I'd advise you hurry the fuck up, as Schrader will probably die of old age in the next few weeks, as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：尤金·施拉德尔
客户：罗伊·苏利文
签约理由:“有一位名叫尤金·施拉德尔的老人，在西区郊区的一栋大楼里工作。施瑞德尔先生，显然是在经营某种奴隶集团，他们专门抓捕西区的好人。他还粗暴地控制自己的地盘，并威胁我和我的企业，理由不过是施拉德尔声称整个地区都是他的“地盘”。通常情况下，我会让他安静地消失，但考虑到施瑞德尔先生的业务性质，我确实认为他应该作为一个公开的例子，说明为什么要做一个有礼貌的邻居。"
附加说明：当他在他的全盛时期，施拉德尔实际上是一个糟糕的混蛋。如今，他已经失去了理智，并且拒绝承认现实情况。奴隶贩子总是该死的，所以让他死吧。我建议你他妈快点，因为施拉德尔可能几周后就会老死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Germanicus, Claudius
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳狄乌斯·日耳曼尼库斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Centurion Claudius Germanicus
Client: Lt. Charles Brandt
Reason for Contract: "Came across this guy's personnel file. He's considered low-priority from a strategic mindset, but I think we can all agree that he'd be better off dead. Claudius is a vicious bastard, even by the (admittedly low) standards of the Legion. They say that if a slave is plotting liberation, the Legionaries hand him to Claudius, and the rest of the slave's short, agonizing life will be spent serving as an example to the others. Seems like killing the Legion prick might be demoralizing, as well as a public service."
Additional Notes: Government/Military contracts are about as rare as one-headed Brahmin for us. Money is money, and the Legion is trash, so get to killing and making the world a better place, and I'll get you paid.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：百夫长克劳迪乌斯·日耳曼尼库斯
客户：查尔斯·勃兰特中尉
签约理由:“我看到了这个人的个人档案。从战略角度来看，他的优先级不高，但我想我们都认为他死了会更好。克劳迪乌斯是个邪恶的混蛋，即使以军团的标准来看也是如此。他们说如果一个奴隶在密谋逃跑，军团就会把他交给克劳迪乌斯，在这个奴隶短暂而痛苦的余生里，他就会成为其他人的榜样。杀死军团的刺头会让他们士气低落，同时也是一种公共服务。”
补充说明：政府/军方合同对我来说就像独头婆罗门一样罕见。不过钱就是钱，军团就是垃圾，所以赶紧去杀人，让世界变得更美好，我会给你报酬的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Antonius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 安东尼乌斯！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearing out geckos?! I am a Centurion! This sort of work would be better given to the lowest of recruits, so that we may bleed them early. I know this was the work of Antonius. That craven little rat couldn't sleep at night, knowing that I stood ready to claim his self-proclaimed duty to oversee the operations in the mesa quarry. He likely facilitated this insult with Stones-Thunder. I know they are working together to keep the quarry slaves in line. It would seem probable that they are conspiring against me in the shadows, as well. After all, Antonius has more in common with some soft woman than with the man he claims to be. His position as centurion is an insult to all of us who have earned this armor. As for Stones-Thunder, that cripple should have had his cut throat years ago. A man that cannot fight is no man at all. I swear by Mars, I shall lay their treachery bare for all to see, and then lash them both to a cross with my own hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清理蜥蜴？！我是百夫长！这种工作最好交给最低级的新兵去做，这样我们就可以提前给他们放血。我知道这是安东尼乌斯的杰作，那只胆小的小老鼠晚上睡不着觉，因为他知道我已经准备好随时要求他履行他自称的监督采石场行动的职责。他很可能与雷霆之石一起促成了这一侮辱行为。我知道他们在一起驯服采石场的奴隶，很有可能他们也在暗中密谋反对我。毕竟，安东尼乌斯与一些软弱的女人有更多的共同点，而不是与他所声称的男人一样，他的百夫长身份是对我们所有赢得这身盔甲的人的侮辱。至于雷霆之石，那个瘸子几年前就该被割喉了，一个不能战斗的人根本就不是人。我对玛尔斯发誓，我会让所有人都看到他们的背叛，然后亲手把他们俩绑在十字架上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You earned a vacation
ESP.TRADUIT: 你赢得了一个假期

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm sure you're aware of the newest bunch of false allegations against Adam. Since the idiot boy has responded to things by running away, it only makes him look guilty. I have no doubt that if he remained here, you would have him acquitted within minutes.
With the increase in attention this mess will be causing, I think it would be wise for you to fade into the background for a bit. While I am very pleased with the excellent legal representation that your family has provided, I am sure you've noticed that others seem to have a certain overriding hatred for you and your father. Since I expect the dross to be combing through our legal history with a fine-toothed comb, it may be best if you were not front and center, yes?
You've earned time off, anyways. I've arranged for you to spend a month or two in New Vegas. You have an executive suite waiting for you in the Gomorrah casino. I hope you weren't expecting the Ultra-Luxe. Of course, I find it likely that the services at Gomorrah are more to your taste, anyways.
Senator Henry Burke
ESP.TRADUIT:
我相信你知道最近听到了一堆针对亚当的虚假指控。因为这个白痴男孩对事情的反应是逃跑，这只会让他看起来有罪。当然我毫不怀疑，如果他留在这里，几分钟之内你就能让他无罪释放。
随着这种混乱会引起越来越多的关注，我认为你最好隐退一下。虽然我对你的家人提供的出色的法律代理感到非常满意，但我相信你已经注意到其他人似乎对你和你父亲有着某种强烈的仇恨。既然我希望这些糟粕能仔细梳理我们的法律历史，也许你最好不要站在最前面，对吧？
不管怎样，你已经赢得了休息的时间。我安排你去新维加斯待一两个月。你在蛾摩拉赌场有一间行政套房等着你，我希望你没想要奢华殿堂。当然，我觉得在蛾摩拉的服务更符合你的口味。
- 联邦参议员亨利·伯克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feldstein, Melvin
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅尔文·费尔德斯坦

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Melvin Feldstein
Client: Rosalind Torres
Reason for Contract: "Lately, a lot of travelers going up to Vegas by way of the 188 have been attacked by a horde of eyebots. They go around shooting anyone they can. All I know about them is that they all got 'Property of Melvin Feldstein' stenciled on their exteriors."
Additional Notes: Yeah, got a couple of reports of some nerd dragging robot parts out of Cerulean Robotics in Freeside. My source chatted with him, he said his name was Melvin, and he was going to fortify a home for himself at the old Repconn HQ.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：梅尔文·费尔德斯坦
客户：罗莎琳德·托雷斯
签约理由:“最近，许多通过188号公路前往维加斯的游客都遭到了一群眼球机器人的袭击。他们到处乱开枪。我只知道他们的外表上都印着‘所有权：梅尔文·费尔德斯坦’。”
附加说明：是的，有几个报告说有个书呆子从自由城的蔚蓝机器人公司拖出了机器人零件。我的线人和他聊了聊，他说他叫梅尔文，他要在旧的Repconn总部为自己加固一个根据地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attention!
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey girls, what's up!
I am a really cool guy looking for love in the Mojave! I have a very good sense of humor, and I am also much smarter than average. Most guys are just jerks who only want you for sex, but I am a sophisticated nice guy, in addition to being a genius. I will treat you like the princess you are, baby. If you have good taste in men and want to meet your future boyfriend, come on to the REPCONN HQ, south of Vegas!
Don't worry, nobody will have to do chores or housework! I deeply respect women as people, and so all the unpleasant jobs will be done by my robots. Don't tell me you have never wished for a man with a robot army.
Love Melvin Feldstein Your Soul Mate <3 <3 <3
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，姑娘们，你们好吗？
我是一个很酷的家伙，在莫哈维寻找真爱！我很有幽默感，也比一般人聪明得多。大多数男人都是只想和你上床的混蛋，但我是个成熟的好人，而且是个天才。我会像对待公主一样对待你，宝贝。如果你对男人有很好的品味，并且想认识你未来的男朋友，来拉斯维加斯南部的REPCONN总部吧！
别担心，不需要你做家务！我非常尊重女性，所以所有不愉快的工作都将由我的机器人来完成。别告诉我你从没想过要一个拥有机器人军队的男人。
爱你的， - 梅尔文·费尔德斯坦
你的灵魂伴侣 <3 <3 <3

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last words and confession
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗言与忏悔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My name is Vernon Phillip Bains. I was born in New Reno in 2258. I cannot live with the guilt of my actions any longer, and so I am choosing to confess before taking my own life.
I was incarcerated by the NCR for drug running. In the correctional facility, I just did as I was told. I beat some people, smuggled some things, and I participated in the uprising, where I killed three guards. After we were free, we started to break into smaller groups. I planned to stay at the prison under Eddie, but a man named Isaiah Darby took me and a handful of others aside. He told us to follow him, he knew a safer place than the prison. A little mining town called New Rockwell.
Darby told us that the town's mines had run dry, and that the town was dying. He said that if we moved quickly, we could claim it for ourselves. All we had to do was wipe out any NCR presence first, meaning just the sheriff. I thought that's what we would be doing when we snuck into town at night and broke into the sheriff's home. Instead, Darby had us tie the sheriff up, and then he had the sheriff's wife and daughter dragged out of their beds.
He was taunting the sheriff, said that he was the one who had caught him in the first place and he wanted revenge. Said the sheriff had a debt that needed settling, and that his wife and daughter would help him pay it.
I knew the gang would kill me if I protested, so I told them I would loot the house. I swear to God that I did not participate in what Darby and the others did to the sheriff's family. I would have stopped them if I could. It is all I see when I sleep. I was too weak to stop it. I should have saved those people and made up for the guards I killed. I deserved to be in prison, we all did. Eventually, Darby burned the house down while the others watched and laughed. He had the sheriff's throat cut in in the center of town, along with his wife and kid. I think all the business owners stayed indoors and got spared, but a few miners and travelers were still in town, and the gang slaughtered all of them.
Before too long, Darby vanished. He didn't even stay to rule over the town, like he said he would. I think a few guys followed him, but a lot of us were left behind, and we all went our separate ways. I would not have stayed, though. I have hated myself every single day since that night. I swear that I did not know what he was planning to do. I wish I killed him when he first met me. The men I killed didn't deserve it.
I know I am going to go to hell when I die, but I cannot live with this any longer. If anyone knows my parents, please tell them that I died bravely. I am sorry for everything I have done.
Vernon Phillip Bains
ESP.TRADUIT:
我叫弗农·菲利普·贝恩斯。我2258年出生在新里诺。我不能再带着我的罪行生活下去了，所以我选择在自杀前忏悔。
我曾因贩毒被NCR关进监狱。在监狱里，我只是按他们说的做了。我打了一些人，走私了一些东西，我还参加了起义，杀了三个守卫。当我们获得自由后，我们开始分成更小的小组。我本来打算待在艾迪的监狱里，但一个叫以赛亚·达比的人把我和其他几个人带走了。他让我们跟着他，他知道有个地方比监狱更安全。一个叫新洛克威尔的矿业小镇。
达比告诉我们这个城镇的矿藏已经枯竭，这个城镇即将死亡。他说如果我们行动迅速，我们就能独揽大权。我们要做的就是先消灭所有NCR的人，我还以为我们晚上溜进镇里闯进警长的家只是干掉警长。相反，达比让我们把警长绑了起来，然后他把警长的妻子和女儿从床上拖了起来。
他在嘲笑警长，说他是第一个抓到他的人，他想报复。说警长有一笔债务需要解决，他的妻子和女儿会帮他还债。
我知道如果我抗议，那帮人会杀了我，所以我告诉他们我要抢劫房子。我对天发誓我没有参与达比和其他人对警长家人所做的事。如果可以，我会阻止他们的。这是我睡觉时看到的一切，我太弱了，阻止不了。我应该去救那些人来补偿我杀掉守卫的事。坐牢是我活该，我们都是。最终，达比烧了房子，而其他人在一旁看着，笑着。他在镇中心割断了警长的喉咙，还有他的妻子和孩子。我想所有的企业主都呆在家里，幸免遇难，但一些矿工和旅行者还在镇上，那帮匪徒把他们全都屠杀了。
不久，达比消失了。他甚至没有留下来统治小镇，就像他说的那样。我想有几个人跟着他，但我们很多人都被甩了，然后各走各的路。不过，我不会留下来。从那天晚上开始，我每天都恨自己。我发誓我不知道他要干什么。真希望他第一次见到我时我就杀了他。我杀的那些人罪有应得。
我知道我死后会下地狱，但我不能再这样活着了。如果有人认识我的父母，请告诉他们我是勇敢地死去的。我为我所做的一切感到抱歉。
- 弗农·菲利普·贝恩斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfinished Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 没写完的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fairbanks, tell your boss I'll consider it. Mojave is starting to lose it's luster, anyway. We had to wipe out a few of those NCR soldier on our way into Boulder City. Back in the Great Plains, we could hit entire homesteads without having to look over our shoulders for the self-proclaimed law.
