Out here, we hit a merchant and his wife, Next thing you know, someone's scribbling our faces on a fucking poster.
This ain't mercenary work, is it? I did enough of that already, and my boys wouldn't follow chain of command. They just don't got the patience, you know how it is. Little birdie told me that a merchant caravan from down south will be passing by Boulder in a couple days. By the time we've burned it, I'll have a definitive answer for you.
In the meantime, I got a couple ideas on
[The letter abruptly ends here.]
ESP.TRADUIT:
费尔班克斯，告诉你老板我会考虑的。不管怎么说，莫哈韦已经开始失去光彩了。我们在去巨石城的路上干掉了几个NCR士兵。回到大平原，我们可以袭击所有的宅基地而不需要小心提防那些自称的法律。在这里，我们袭击了一个商人和他的妻子，然后就有人把我们的脸涂在了海报上。
这不是雇佣兵的工作，对吧？我已经做得够多了，我的孩子们不听指挥了。他们就是没有耐心，你知道的。有只小鸟告诉我，一支从南方来的商队将在几天后经过巨石城。等我们把它烧了，我会给你一个明确的答案。
与此同时，我想到了几个主意
[信到此戛然而止。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get me some ammo
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一些弹药

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Make a run to the 188 and pick me up some ammo. You're the only one of us that nobody knows on sight, so don't complain to me about shit.
I'm gonna need some .45 ACP rounds. Let's go with hollow points this time. Get anything you need while you're there, but don't take it slow. Word from that Fairbanks guy is that some sort of assassin Is heading our way. Don't forget the bomb we rigged downstairs, either.
Jeff
ESP.TRADUIT:
跑到188号公路，给我拿点弹药。你是我们当中唯一一个没人认识的人，所以别跟我抱怨。
我需要一些.45的ACP子弹，这次我们用空心弹吧。你去那里的时候需要什么就带什么，但你最好快点，那个叫费尔班克斯的家伙说有个杀手正向我们走来。别忘了我们在楼下装的炸弹。
- 杰夫

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's Raid!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们行动吧！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: yo i hear that fucking motel with that ugly ghoul motherfucker running it, it got all sorts of drugs and money inside!!! lets raid it and take everything and then we can spend our motherfuckin money in the thorn and i bet i can convince red lucy to get naked for me!!!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说那个丑陋的食尸鬼开的汽车旅馆，里面有各种各样的毒品和钱！！让我们洗劫它，拿走所有东西，然后我们他妈的把钱花在荆棘街，我打赌我能说服红露西为我脱光衣服！！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off, Frank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚蛋，弗兰克

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frank, don't ever contact me again. You're pleasant enough to share a drink with, but I heard what you've been doing in your free time, you sick fucker. I don't usually suggest things like this, but have you ever considered suicide? You should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗兰克，别再联系我了。和你一起喝杯酒是够开心的了，但我听说你空闲时间都在干些什么，你个变态。我通常不会建议你这么做，但你考虑过自杀吗？你应该这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elimination Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 取消合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
People have to know that when you fuck with us, we'll fuck back ten times harder.
&PCName; iced the boss's private attorney, so it's time for some payback, of the "make this sorry motherfucker regret ever being born" sort. No excuses, and no half-assing it, either.
Zed
ESP.TRADUIT:
人们必须知道，如果敢惹我们，我们会十倍奉还。
&PCName;杀了老板的私人律师，是时候报复了，"让这混蛋后悔出生"那种。不要找借口，也不要敷衍了事。
- 泽德

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more
ESP.TRADUIT: 不再

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This war has gone on for too long. I did not join the army to perch on the dam, waiting for the enemy to come to us. If we have not annexed the Mojave at this point, we never will. They say we're actively fighting a war, so grunts like me can't go home. Where is the action, then? Our last major engagement with the Legion was in 77. I am not going to risk my life in meaningless skirmishes anymore.
Ranger Burns, I implore you to consider this. If we're going to break free, we will need a battle-hardened veteran in our ranks.
PFC Carl Foster
ESP.TRADUIT:
这场战争已经持续太久了。我参军不是为了守在大坝上，等着敌人来找我们。如果我们此时还没有吞莫哈维沙漠，那永远也成功不了了。他们说我们正在积极作战，所以像我这样的士兵不能回家。那么，行动在哪里？我们与军团的最后一次主要交战是在77年。我不会再冒生命危险参加毫无意义的小规模战斗了。
游骑兵伯恩斯，我恳求你考虑一下。如果我们要摆脱困境，我们的队伍中需要一个久经沙场的老兵。
- 一等兵卡尔·福斯特

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burns, Sebastian
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞巴斯蒂安·伯恩斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Sebastian Burns
Client: Ned Whitley, NCR Rangers
Reason for Contract: "Burns was one of us. Guess having to actually work was an affront to his sensibilities. He took up with a band of other cowards, and the whole lot of them are hanging out on that old broken bridge over Crescent Canyon. Maybe the bastard hasn't done any real damage yet, but he's an insult to every last one of us true Rangers."
Additional Notes: An ex-ranger and his military deserter pals. They'll be trained and well-armed, so hit them hard and fast.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称：塞巴斯蒂安·伯恩斯
客户：内德·惠特利，NCR游骑兵
签约理由：“伯恩斯是我们的一员。我猜不得不去工作是对他感情的一种侮辱。他结交了一帮懦夫，他们全都在新月峡谷的破桥上闲荡。也许这个混蛋还没有造成什么真正的伤害，但他对我们每一个真正的游骑兵都是一种侮辱。”
附加说明：一个前游侠和他的逃兵朋友。他们受过良好的训练，装备精良，所以要快速有力地打击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snyder, Geoff
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰夫·斯奈德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: Geoff Snyder
Client: Joe Tully
Reason for Contract: "Wasting company time."
Additional Notes: This asshole kept taking out contracts and then canceling at the last minute when I demanded payment. I'd like it if you just went to his home and shot him, but if you have moral reservations about that sort of shit, I suppose I would be satisfied if you just scare the piss out of him, instead.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标姓名：杰夫·斯奈德
客户：乔·塔利
签约理由：“浪费公司时间。”
附加说明：这个混蛋不停地拿出合同，然后在我要求付款的最后一分钟取消合同。我希望你能直接去他家开枪打死他，但如果你对这种事有道德保留，我想如果你能把他吓得尿裤子，我就心满意足了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell are you? Nevermind, just please tell me you're here to get me out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是谁？算了，告诉我你是来救我出去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grace Lancaster [06008BE0] (mod) Quest : ([0600A48C]aaaCasaGraceRescue) Holy Trinity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\femaleadult01default\aaacasagra_greeting_0000b77f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要离开这鬼地方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grace Lancaster [06008BE0] (mod) Quest : ([0600A48C]aaaCasaGraceRescue) Holy Trinity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\femaleadult01default\aaacasagra_greeting_0000b782_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing? Just kill them already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在做什么？快杀了他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grace Lancaster [06008BE0] (mod) Quest : ([0600A48C]aaaCasaGraceRescue) Holy Trinity EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\femaleadult01default\aaacasagra_greeting_0002bde6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New guy? Alright, hello and welcome to Tully... Tully Headhunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新人？好吧，你好，还有欢迎来到塔利...塔利猎头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_greeting_000117a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm assuming you're here about work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你是为了工作来的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_greeting_000117a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again. You interested in giving this thing another shot, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你又来了。你有兴趣再来一次吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_greeting_000156c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_greeting_000162db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. If you need some supplies, I can hook you up. If you're looking for work, well... I think you cleared my whole list.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来，如果你需要一些补给，我可以帮你。如果你在找工作，嗯...你把我的单子都清空了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_greeting_00047603_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Herculad, I'm your biggest fan!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是赫库拉德，我是你最大的粉丝！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Herculad [060162CC] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_greeting_0000bc78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell you, killing lots and lots of people sure is thirsty work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，杀很多很多人肯定是很累人的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Assassin [06003990] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaacontrac_greeting_0001d6a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God damn I hate casino contracts. You know, I like having my weapons organized by holster, and then they just take everything and throw it in a bin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我讨厌赌场合同。我喜欢把我的武器按皮套整理好，然后他们把所有东西都拿走扔进垃圾箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Assassin [06003990] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaacontrac_greeting_0002ca15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you ever notice that you and me are always in here, turning in contracts at the same time. Weird coincidence, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有注意到你和我总是在这里，同时交合同。奇怪的巧合，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Assassin [06003990] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaacontrac_greeting_0001d6a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy of mine said it feels like the action in the Mojave is dying down. Bullshit, I say all the people with short attention spans left, that's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友说感觉莫哈韦沙漠的行动正在消退。 狗屎，我说是所有注意力不集中的人都离开了，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Assassin [06003990] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaacontrac_greeting_0001d6a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Worst target I ever took on? Some dude named Mike, he threw sand in my eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我遇到过的最糟糕的目标？有个叫迈克的家伙，往我眼睛里撒沙子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That kid in here, Casey? She's my lady friend's little sister. Dunno which of them likes to annoy me more.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_greeting_000409eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except for speed. And adaptive thinking. I also have trouble using the stairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了速度 和适应性思维。，不过我很难使用楼梯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_greeting_000409eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_goodbye_00016ed8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_goodbye_0002ca21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, Daddy Lee has work to do, sorting out all this ho tomfoolery. No time to chat, and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，李老爹有工作要做，处理一些无聊的事。没时间聊天了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyleequest_goodbye_00018ccc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是走吧！.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, bitch. Just don't go wandering, now. Daddy Lee would be apoplectic with rage if he had to track down a third bitch today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧，婊子。现在，别到处乱逛。如果李老爹今天要去找第三个婊子他肯定会气疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyleequest_goodbye_00018ccd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是走吧！.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，随便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_goodbye_0002629d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't go... Just kill me, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要走...杀了我，先。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chunks Woodcock [06001F12] (mod) Quest : ([0602C9FE]aaaChunksWoodcockQuest) Hung EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult07\aaachunksw_goodbye_0002ca05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，拜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你应该。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhayesquest_goodbye_00034258_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是走吧！.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_goodbye_00036de5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是走吧！.

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGraceRescue
Oh, thank god. I'm getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，感谢上帝。我要离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grace Lancaster [06008BE0] (mod) Quest : ([0600A48C]aaaCasaGraceRescue) Holy Trinity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\femaleadult01default\aaacasagra_aaagracerescue_0000b77e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCasaGraceRescue 30 ShowMessage aaaGraceFuckOffMessage aaaCasaGraceREF.disable
I'm here to get you out of here. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来救你出去的，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGraceNoRescue
Are you serious?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的吗？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Grace Lancaster [06008BE0] (mod) Quest : ([0600A48C]aaaCasaGraceRescue) Holy Trinity EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\femaleadult01default\aaacasagra_aaagracenorescu_0000b781_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on a minute, I need to check something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，我需要检查一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyWhatDo
Well... Right now, not much. Um, some of the regulars pay me to clean their guns. And sometimes Joe has me buy booze for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...现在，没多少。有些常客付钱让我给他们擦枪，有时乔会让我给他买酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseywhatdo_00014ac9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to hunt bounties, but they say I'm not qualified to work here, yet. Well, how am I supposed to do that if they won't give me any jobs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找赏金，但他们说我还没有资格在这里工作。如果他们都不给我工作，我要怎么办呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseywhatdo_00014ac9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyTooYoung
Why? I can shoot a gun pretty good, you know. Well, a rifle, anyways. I'm kinda bad with a pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？我可以很好地开枪，你知道的。好吧，反正是步枪，我不太会用手枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytooyoun_0000bc7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, no one will let me do any work, anyways. I had to beg for a week before my sister would even let me come here at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说了，反正也没人让我干活。我苦苦哀求了一个星期，我姐姐才让我来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytooyoun_0000bc7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, at least I can try to learn some things so that I can be the best there is when they actually let me work. Whenever that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，至少我可以试着学习一些东西，这样当他们让我工作的时候，我就可以做到最好。无论何时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytooyoun_0000bc7b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, got any tips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，嘿，有什么建议吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytooyoun_0000bc7b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you a little young for this line of work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你干这行是不是太年轻了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyTipMoralizing
Pfft. That's lame. What are you, a priest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗，这很蹩脚，你是什么神父吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytipmora_0000bc7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rest of the world is happy to kill each other over small shi- things. Why should I be the only exception?
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上其他地方的人都乐于为了小事互相残杀。为什么我是唯一的例外？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytipmora_0000bc7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, that kinda pacifism thing, that isn't very useful if no one else goes along with it, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，那种和平主义的东西，如果没有其他人赞同，那就没什么用了，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseytipmora_0000bc7d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tips? Sure, kid. Go home and do something else. You shouldn't aspire to be a killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 建议？当然，孩子。回家做点别的事情吧，你不应该渴望成为一个杀手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueWhatDo
Chemistry, says the educated man. Cooking drugs, if you prefer keeping things petty and small-minded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 化学，受过教育的人说。烹调毒品，如果你喜欢让事情变得琐碎和心胸狭窄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluewha_0000cae4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any event, independents like myself are best out on the fringes. Otherwise, we risk stepping into someone else's territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，像我这样的独立人士最好是靠边站。否则，我们就有踏入别人领地的风险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluewha_0000cae4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, if something goes wrong, less chance of innocent bystanders finding themselves caught in the explosion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，如果出了什么差错，也能减少无辜的旁观者被爆炸卷入的可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluewha_0000cae4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueDrugDealer
Okay, I fill a demand from discerning customers. Why should someone else dictate what consenting adults choose to put into their bodies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我满足了挑剔的顾客的需求。为什么要由别人来决定成年人能选择将什么放入他们的身体？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluedru_0000cae6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least with me, customers get what they pay for. I don't cut my products with drywall or paint thinner. I don't gouge prices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少在我这里，顾客一分钱一分货。我不会用干墙或油漆稀释剂来切割我的产品。我也不哄抬价格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluedru_0000cae6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're a drug dealer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你是个毒贩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueContract
I see. Well, why don't you take your contract and leave it by my outhouse, so it can actually be good for something, eventually?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了，好吧，你为什么不把你的合同放在我的屋外？这样它最终可以真正对某些东西有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluecon_0000cae8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I left the NCR because I refuse to be a part of a system that exists for the sole purpose of rolling over individuals and their rights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我离开了NCR，因为我拒绝成为这个系统的一部分，这个系统存在的唯一目的就是压制个人和他们的权利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluecon_0000cae8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to the East, astoundingly, there's an even more draconian collection of megalomaniacal lunatics. You know they crucify people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而在东方，令人震惊的是，有一群更加严酷狂妄的疯子。你知道他们把人钉死在十字架上吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluecon_0000cae8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a contract on your life here. Or for you could leave the Mojave. Your choice, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有份关于你生命的合同，或者你可以离开莫哈维沙漠。我想这可以由你来选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueNCR
What, is that a fucking joke?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这是一个该死的笑话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never asked for them to tell me how to live my life. Does being born on their soil automatically invalidate my basic human dignity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未要求他们告诉我该如何生活，难道在他们的土地上出生就自动使我的基本人类尊严失效？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Freedom and self-determination are the cornerstones of basic human existence, and are fundamentally incompatible with government of any sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由和自决是人类基本生存的基石，从根本上说与任何形式的政府都不相容。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the fucking gall to penalize and denigrate me for my career? Because I make drugs, and drugs kill? Are you fucking kidding me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有他妈的胆量来惩罚和诋毁我的职业？因为我制造毒品，而毒品会杀人？你他妈的在跟我开玩笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns are much more efficient, and the NCR is all too happy to work with the Gun Runners. Hypocritical bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪更有效率，NCR也很乐意与军火贩子合作。虚伪的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Mojave has real potential. New Vegas could be a very lucrative city-state, independent and beholden to no one. So, I'll stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但莫哈维具有真正的潜力。新维加斯可以成为一个非常赚钱的城邦，独立而不受制于任何人。所以，我要留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluencr_0000caea_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem with the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对NCR有什么意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueGreatKhans
I don't doubt it. I sell better, cleaner product. I concede, they can deal in bulk that I could never hope to match, but... SHRUG Quality/quantity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怀疑。我卖的是更好、更干净的产品。但他们可以大批量生产，我承认我永远无法企及，但是...质量与产量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they can't handle the competition, maybe they should find a different market.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们不能应对竞争，也许他们应该找一个不同的市场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the Great Khans that want you out of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是大汗帮想让你离开莫哈维沙漠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueJoinKhans
Not a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluejoi_0000caee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First of all, the Khans make chems because it's their only product they have to sell. Their interests are in profit, not purity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，大汗帮生产毒品是因为这是他们唯一要卖的产品。他们只是为了利润，不关心纯度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluejoi_0000caee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I worked for them, I expect they'd order me to half-ass my work to get it done quicker. Not like the Fiends care about buying quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我为他们工作，我估计他们会命令我把品质降低一半，以便更快完成。恶魔帮才不在乎东西的质量呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluejoi_0000caee_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, their initiation rites involve beating prospective members bloody. Fuck. That.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，他们的入会仪式包括将未来的成员打得头破血流。操，这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluejoi_0000caee_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if you joined the Khans? Seems like a win/win to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你加入大汗帮呢？对我来说似乎是双赢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueDifficult
Well, you could go out and find an accommodating sphincter to shove that contract, for one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你可以出去找一个可容纳的括约肌，把那份合同塞进去，举个例子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluedif_0000caf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not be bullied out of my home and my business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会因为被人逼迫就离开我的家和我的生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluedif_0000caf0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to be reasonable here. You're just being difficult. What would you prefer, death?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在试着尽量讲道理，你只是在刁难我。你想要什么，死亡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueStrength
[FAILED] Wow. It must feel pretty bad to be so pathetic that a chemistry nerd will laugh off your impotent little threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]哇，让一个化学书呆子对你无力的威胁一笑置之一定感觉很糟糕吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluestr_0000e818_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't leave, I'll beat you up. Oh yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不走，我就揍你一顿。噢耶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] ...Yeah, probably.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]...是的，有可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluestr_0000e819_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll take my operations elsewhere. Prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我去别处运作。讨厌的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluestr_0000e819_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChrisBlueQuest 20 rewardxp 12
You know, if I beat you 'til your limbs didn't work anymore, I bet the client would accept that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，如果我把你打得四肢瘫痪，我打赌客户会接受的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueTerrify
Jesus fucking Christ, alright! I get it! I'll move my operation somewhere more receptive, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的耶稣基督啊，好吧！我知道了！我会把我的实验转移到更能接受的地方，行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisblueter_0000e81c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, uh, look, as a sign of good faith, uh... Here, help yourself to these. Might help calm you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，呃，听着，为了表示诚意，呃...给，请随便吃。也许能让你冷静下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisblueter_0000e81c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChrisBlueQuest 20 player.additem morphine 5
How would you feel about getting stuffed into one of those cooking vats for a few hours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得被塞进烹饪大桶里几个小时会怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueBarter
[FAILED] I'll make more money... if I were to abandon my proven money-making operation? That right, genius?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我会赚更多的钱...如果我放弃我赚钱的生意？ 对吧，天才？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluebar_0000e81e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame I don't offer free samples, because you seem like the sort of person who needs some mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾我不提供免费样品，因为你看起来像是那种需要脑力的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluebar_0000e81e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But think of all the money you could make if you quit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但想想如果你退出，你能赚多少钱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That's... not a bad point. Annoying, but still probably true.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这...这一点不错。很烦人，但可能还是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluebar_0000e81f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and if I corner a new marketplace, then I could charge what I want. Yeah, I get you. Alright, I'll pack up for greener pastures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，如果我垄断了一个新市场，我就可以随心所欲地收费了，我懂你的意思。好吧，我去收拾东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluebar_0000e81f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, well, you can go tell your boss that you did it. Everyone gets paid. Adios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，嗯，你可以去告诉你的老板你做到了，每个人都能得到报酬。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisbluebar_0000e81f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChrisBlueQuest 20 rewardxp 20
You said yourself, the people here don't care about quality. Find a new market, and monopolize it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己也说过，这里的人不在乎质量。所以你去找一个新市场，垄断它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChrisBlueAttack
Yeah, well... Fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，好吧...操你妈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chris Blue [0600C627] (mod) Quest : ([0600CAE1]aaaChrisBlueQuest) Baby Blue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaachrisbl_aaachrisblueatt_0000e821_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] I'll keep it simple and kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]我就简单点，杀了你吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyAdvice
Alright, if it ain't happened to you yet, mark my words. It will, eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果这件事还没发生在你身上，记住我的话。最终会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be facing down some mark who got it in his head that he's smart or sophisticated or some shit. Happens to all of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要面对的是一些脑子里认为自己很聪明或很老练的人，或者是一些狗屎。我们所有人都会遇到这种情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And on that day, your retard target is probably gonna try to guilt trip you. "Oh, you kill people for money. You're just as bad as me."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天，你的弱智目标可能会试图让你感到内疚。“哦，你杀人是为了钱，你和我一样坏。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "You're a hypocrite. How do you sleep at night? I bet you've killed more folks than I ever have." That kinda shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: "你是个伪君子。你晚上怎么睡得着？我打赌你杀的人比我杀的人多。" 这一类的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the proper response is to shoot them in the fucking kneecaps, tell them that you fucked their mother, and then cut their throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正确的反应是朝他们的膝盖骨开枪，告诉他们你操了他们的妈妈，然后割开他们的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to be decisive in this business. So, you're a killer. Big fucking deal. Make peace with it, and those idiots got nothing on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做这行你必须果断。所以，你是一个杀手，他妈的大人物。跟他们讲和，而那些白痴对你毫无办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, any career advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，有什么职业建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes you'll get yourself a target with a love of theatrical bullshit. They wanna monologue at you, common sense be damned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候你会因为喜欢戏剧冲突而成为目标。他们想对你独白，让常识见鬼去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In cases like that, my advice would be to fire a load of buckshot into their guts while they're mid-speech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，我的建议是在他们说到一半的时候朝他们的内脏发射一颗铅弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the guts, and not the head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么是内脏，而不是脑袋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that they've got enough time for their dying thoughts to be: "Oh, shit. This was a bad idea."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样他们临终前就有足够的时间去想：“噢，该死，这是个坏主意。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any words of wisdom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么忠告吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some folk might tell you that you always need to be professional. Never take anything personal, all that shit. Good idea, on paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人可能会告诉你，你总是需要专业，永远不要把感情用事放在心上，之类的废话。好主意，写在纸上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when your livelihood hinges on killing folk, and their continued existence hinges on killing you first, sometimes tempers flare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当你的生计取决于杀人，而他们的生存又取决于先杀了你时，有时怒火会爆发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shame in that. Just makes it all the sweeter when you win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没什么可羞耻的。当你赢的时候，感觉更甜蜜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any general advice for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么一般性的建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, here's one I figured out early on. Good thing, too, 'cause I can't work if I don't get a good sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，这是我早期想到的一个。这也是个好东西，如果我睡不好，就没法工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Invariably, you'll get some targets with family. Some of those sorts will try to get revenge. No big deal, you self-defense those fuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无可避免地，你会得到一些有家庭的目标，其中一些人会试图报复。 没什么大不了的，你完全可以对那些混蛋自卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, the annoying ones are the ones that get all weepy. Calling you a murderer, asking why you blew their daddy up, some shit like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，烦人的是那些哭哭啼啼的人。说你是杀人犯，问你为什么炸死了他们的爸爸，诸如此类的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't on you. Innocent folk don't get prices put on their heads. You're just the triggerman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不关你的事，无辜的人是不会被悬赏的。你只是个杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b6f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any professional advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么专业的建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, watch out for that stupid blame game that tends to crop up in this business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，小心这个行业里经常出现的那种愚蠢的指责游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b70_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know. "You killed Fuckface, and now we're beset by problems that he was staving off. It's all your fault!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的。“你杀了那个狗日的，现在我们被他遗留的问题所困扰。都是你的错！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b70_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain't. People are accountable for their own actions. Nothing more. If a man gets a price on his head, it's his own damn fault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是这样的，人们要对自己的行为负责，仅此而已。如果有人悬赏要他的人头，那是他自己的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b70_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any wisdom for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么建议给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. You're gonna be in combat. You're gonna be killing people. There's gonna be a lot of adrenaline pumping, and it's gonna feel good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你要参加战斗，你要去杀人。会有大量的肾上腺素分泌，而且感觉很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b71_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's biology. Nothing to be ashamed about. Few things feel better than killing a man who wants to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是生物学，没什么好羞愧的。没有什么比杀一个想杀你的人更爽的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyadvi_00010b71_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么建议？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyWorkYes
Alright, good, but why should I take you on? What do you bring to the table?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，很好，但我为什么要选你？你能带来什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywork_000117ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyWorkNo
Brilliant. Well, you wanna see yourself out? I got no use for random hobos wandering around my place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 精彩。你想自己出去吗？我可不想让流浪汉在我家附近游荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywork_000117ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上，没了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyGunsCheck
[FAILED] Brilliant. "Can shoot a gun at a fifth-grade level." What else you got?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]精彩。"能以五年级的水平射击"你还有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyguns_000117ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't mean to brag, but I've been known to fire a gun... and sometimes hit my target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不是要吹牛，但众所周知我会开枪...而且有时会击中我的目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Now we're talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 现在我们来聊聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyguns_000117af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, on the list of top ten skills you need to make it in this business, numbers one through fucking nine are shooting people with guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，在这一行业所需的十大技能清单上，第一项到他妈的第九项是用枪打人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyguns_000117af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, so, ready to get to work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，那么，准备好开始工作了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyguns_000117af_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
I can drop a Deathclaw with one shot from a half-mile away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以在半英里外一枪打中死亡爪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullySpeechCheck
[FAILED] Well, you've failed to convince me that you're worth hiring. So your success rate is kinda spotty.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 好吧，你没能让我相信你值得雇用。因为你的成功率有点不稳定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyspee_000117b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can, like, talk good. Convince people to do things, and whatnot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以，比如说，好好说话。说服人们去做某些事情，还有其他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well, you don't actually need to get close to folk if you've got a high-powered rifle, but point taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，如果你有一把强力的步枪，你其实不需要接近别人，但我明白你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyspee_000117b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you ready to get to work? You ain't going to try to talk me into paying you to do nothing, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好开始工作了吗？你不会是想说服我付钱让你什么都不做吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyspee_000117b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
rewardxp 12
I could charm my way past any guard, into any compound. I'm a people person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以用魅力通过任何警卫，进入任何院落。我是个善于交际的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyScienceCheck
[FAILED] Well, maybe you can fix this dead pixel on my terminal, over there. Beyond that, I don't know that I need you for anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 好吧，也许你可以修复我终端显示器上哪个坏点，除此之外，我不知道我需要你做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyscie_000117b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm, y'know, alright with tech stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，你知道的，对技术方面的东西很在行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Alright, that's kinda niche, but you've at least got potential as some kinda specialist.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，这有点小众，但你至少有成为某种专家的潜力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyscie_000117b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, ready to get to work, smart guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好开始工作了吗，聪明人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyscie_000117b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
There isn't a security system in the world that I can't crack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上没有我破解不了的安全系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyKilledCaesar
Wait, shit, that was you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，该死，是你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullykill_00011daf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, alright. I guess you can probably handle yourself to some degree. Ready to get started?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好的。我猜你在某种程度上可以控制自己，准备好开始了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullykill_00011daf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
I killed Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了凯撒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyFirstTier
Alright, here's what I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这是我有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyfirs_000129c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a first-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份一级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No you're not. Go finish the contract you've already taken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？ 不你没有。 去完成你已经签下的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyfirs_000129c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready for a tier-one contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好签一级合同了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullySecondTier
Alrighty, I'll set you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我帮你安排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyseco_000129c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a second-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份二级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope, complete a few first-tier contracts first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行，先完成几份一级合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyseco_000129c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a second-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份二级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already have a job you're supposed to be doing. Go do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经有一份你该做的工作了，去完成它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyseco_000129c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a second-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份二级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyThirdTier
Alrighty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullythir_000129c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a third-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份三级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope. New guys don't get to start with the veteran work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行，新人不可能一开始就做老兵的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullythir_000129c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a third-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份三级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already have a contract. Go finish that, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经签了合同，先把它完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullythir_000129c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a third-tier contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一份三级合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyRepairWeapons
If you pay me, sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你付我钱，当然可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyrepairw_00014acb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowRepairMenu
So, can you repair my stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能修理我的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyWhyHere
My sister's boyfriend is a scalper from back West. She gave him permission to show me the HQ, or whatever you call it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我姐姐的男朋友是个西部来的黄牛。她允许他带我去总部，或者随便你怎么叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseywhyhere_000150c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly 'cause I kept bugging her about it. I also might have implied windows would get broken if she didn't let me. Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是因为我一直在烦她，我还暗示过如果她不让我来，也许我会把窗户打破。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseywhyhere_000150c5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how'd you actually end up here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底是怎么到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyPsychopath
Alright. That's weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，真够奇怪的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseypsychop_000150c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no better feeling in the world than the thrill of killing another person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上没有比杀人更让人兴奋的感觉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseyProfessional
Yeah, I guess that makes sense. It'd be kinda weird if killing people was a hobby, wouldn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想这说得通。如果杀人是一种爱好，那就有点奇怪了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyprofess_000150c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, not that weird, though. You think raiders would spend so much time decorating their territory with corpses if they could read books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，没那么奇怪。 你认为掠夺者如果会学习，他们还会花那么多时间用尸体装饰自己的领地吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyprofess_000150c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Professionalism is key. You're doing a job. It just happens to involve killing people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 专业精神是关键。你在做一份工作，它只是碰巧涉及杀人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCaseySpeed
'Cause if they have friends, they'll probably try to shoot you, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为如果他们有朋友，他们可能会试图向你开枪，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyspeed_0002ca20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been shot at. That's actually probably a good thing, but maybe not for this job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有中过枪。这可能是件好事，但对这份工作来说未必。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyspeed_0002ca20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that it is my job. Yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这不是我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Casey [0600BC75] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaacaseygirlvoice\aaacontrac_aaacaseyspeed_0002ca20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just have to handle each target as quickly and cleanly as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只需要尽可能干净利落地处理掉每个目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTullyGoodToGo
I suppose we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'll give you a quick overview of how this operation runs. Now listen up, 'cause I hate repeating myself near as much as I hate cazadors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会快速概述这个操作是如何执行的。仔细听好了，因为我讨厌重复我的话就像我讨厌猎蜂一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now first off, to keep dumb new recruits from getting wasted on their first job, I keep things organized into three tiers, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，为了不让愚蠢的新人在第一份工作上浪费时间，我把工作分成三级，懂吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First tier, you got your pussy-ass targets. Card cheats, drug cooks, public masturbators. That sorta shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一级，你得到一些傻逼目标。信用卡诈骗犯，瘾君子，暴露狂，总之都是些狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Second tier, we got guys who might make you work for it. Third tier, we got the badass fuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二级，我们有些会让你想要工作的目标。第三级，我们有些真正的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you'll be starting with the softer targets, just to save me time and money, and you blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会从比较好对付的目标开始，为我节省时间和金钱，还有你的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you see a contract you like, you buy it from me. You can only have one open contract at a time. You succeed, I pay you back with interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你看到你喜欢的合同，就从我这里买。不过你一次只能接一份合同。你成功了，我就连本带利还给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Higher risk means higher reward, in case that weren't fucking obvious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风险越大回报就越大，这样说够通俗易懂了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about it. If you're still confused, check that terminal in the corner of the room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些了。如果你还是没搞明白，就去看看房间角落里的终端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaatullygoodtog_000162ce_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHHJoinedTully to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaHHJoinedTully + 1
So, are we good to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们可以开始了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyUnarmedCheck
[FAILED] Anyone with hands can do that. What else you got?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]这不是任何有手的人都能做到吗？还有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyunar_000162d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can punch people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以揍人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Alright, I suppose there's something to be said for being able to kill a man, even if you're disarmed.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好吧，我想即使你被解除了武器，也有一些东西可以说是能够杀死一个人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyunar_000162d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prefer it don't come to that, but the way some people around here act, you'd think stealing your guns is how they get off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好别到那一步，但这里有些人的行事方式，会认为偷你的枪是他们脱身的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyunar_000162d1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
I don't even need a weapon to take someone down. All I need are my hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不需要武器就能干掉一个人，我只需要我的双手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyEnergyCheck
[FAILED] You know what I think of laser guns? I think they're what you hand old men and little girls who can't handle a bit of recoil.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你知道我怎么看激光枪吗？我觉得这是给那些不能承受一点后坐力的老人和小女孩用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyener_000162d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是哪种？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyener_000162d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can shoot lasers, and sometimes plasma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能发射激光，有时也能发射等离子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] If you say so. In my experience, fancy future-guns are best for looking flashy. I'd rather shoot lead than light, any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]如果你这么说的话。根据我的经验，花哨的未来武器完全华而不实。我宁愿射铅弹也不想射光线，任何时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyener_000162d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, if it can kill a man, it can kill a man. I suppose it'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，如果它能杀死一个人，它就能杀死一个人。我觉得OK。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyener_000162d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest 10
I specialize in reducing my enemies to piles of glowing ash and liquefied remains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的专长是把我的敌人变成一堆发光的灰烬和液化的残骸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyMeleeCheck
[FAILED] No, because I have no fucking clue who you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]不，因为我根本不知道你是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymele_000162d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't someone who excels at first impressions, I can tell that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看得出来，你不擅长给人留下第一印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymele_000162d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen what I can do with a knife?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过我用刀能做什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah, that's plenty impressive, but pragmatism should be the priority over showmanship, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]好，这确实让人印象深刻，但实用主义应该优先于表演技巧，你不这么觉得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymele_000162d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, gold-plated guns are just the fucking worst. Nothing screams: "I'm a pussy!" quite like a golden Desert Eagle, you know?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydadd_000186bd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And which profession is most liable to use something like that, huh? Yeah, I rest my case. Plus they also got those giant gold cups, too.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydadd_000186bd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just go kill the pimp, okay? Or talk him out of his current bullshit, if you're the sort to place value on all human life. Which you shouldn't.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydadd_000186bd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Primm is a little shitty town, populated with little shitty people. People with ridiculous ideas about ethics and morality, you know what I mean?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleedese_000186c2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't no johnnies for the bitches in a place like that, is all Daddy Lee is saying. And these bitches know it, oh yeah.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleethir_00018cbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee is outraged and appalled at the disloyalty of these bitches! After all Daddy Lee has done for them! He gave them food and shelter and love!

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleeboun_00018cc2_3.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleeboun_00018cc2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look what they've forced Daddy Lee to do! Daddy Lee rues the day he didn't order those sluts chained to his radiator 23 hours a day!

ESP.ORIGINAL: First of all, Daddy Lee's proper title is Daddy Lee. Mr. Lee was Daddy Lee's father, and his pimp-hand was both weak and unenviable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，李老爹的正式称呼是李老爹。李先生是李老爹的父亲，他拉皮条的手段既软弱又不令人羡慕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, Daddy Lee is not combing the desert for "women". Calling these traitorous whores "women" is an affront to dignified women the world over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其次，李老爹并不是在沙漠中寻找“女人”。称这些叛徒妓女为“女人”是对全世界有尊严妇女的侮辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Third, they absolutely, positively, unambiguously do have to work for Daddy Lee, even if they don't want to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第三，她们绝对、肯定、明确地必须为李老爹工作，即使她们不想这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, all of this drivel has served no purpose beyond infuriating Daddy Lee, and marking you for the ignorant bitch that you is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，所有这些胡言乱语除了激怒李老爹，并将你标记为无知的婊子外，没有任何作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Daddy Lee knows of only one use for an ignorant bitch. Daddy Lee always keeps his pimp-hand strong for just such an occasion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而李老爹只知道一个无知的婊子的用途，李老爹总是为这种场合保持他的皮条客之手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold still, bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要动，婊子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc5_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Listen Mr. Lee, these women don't have to work for you if they don't want. Let them go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，李先生，如果这些女人不愿意，她们可以不为你工作。放她们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Ah, it would seem as though this whole affair was based upon an incorrect first impression.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]啊，看来这整件事都是基于一个错误的第一印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee was laboring under the delusion that you were a member of the general public at large.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李老爹有个错觉以为你是普通民众中的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee failed to recognize a fellow pimp at first sight, and for that, Daddy Lee apologizes most profusely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李老爹没能一眼认出一个拉皮条的同行，为此，李老爹深表歉意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In regards to the bitches in question, Daddy Lee reluctantly recognizes that, by pimp law, the hoes now belong unequivocally to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那些婊子，李老爹不情愿地承认，根据拉皮条的法律，这些妓女现在明确地属于你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee advises you give each of them at least twenty solid pimp-slaps, otherwise they may remain ignorant of they place relative to yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李老爹建议你给她们每个人至少20个耳光，否则她们可能仍然不知道自己的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, pleasure though it was for Daddy Lee to converse with a fellow professional, Daddy Lee is short on time, and tired of this fucking desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，虽然李老爹很高兴能和专业人士交谈，但李老爹时间紧迫，也厌倦了这该死的沙漠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee is going to investigate Vegas proper, both for new hoes, as well as a liquor dispensary with which to refill his pimp cup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李老爹要去维加斯考察，既要找新的妓女，也要找一家药房给皮条客斟酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Daddy Lee bids you farewell, and good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 李老爹向你们道别，祝你们好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleespee_00018cc6_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 20 playsound UIPimpBoy setstage aaaDaddyLeeQuest 20
I don't think you know who you're talking to, Daddy Lee. They aren't your hoes anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你不知道你在跟谁说话，李老爹。她们不再是你的妓女了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDaddyLeeCombat
Now, Daddy Lee feels he has an obligation to point out that the only thing lower than a ho is a person who willingly works for a ho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，李老爹觉得他有义务指出，唯一比妓女更低贱的是愿意为妓女工作的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleecomb_00018ccb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevertheless, Daddy Lee will fulfill his duty as a pimp, and kick the shit out of you. Let's get on with it, bitch. You made me do this, understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，李老爹还是会履行他作为皮条客的职责，把你的屎踢出来。我们开始吧，婊子，是你逼我这么做的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Daddy Lee [06002204] (mod) Quest : ([060186BA]aaaDaddyLeeQuest) Pimping Ain't Easy EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaadaddyle_aaadaddyleecomb_00018ccb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] I'm going to collect the bounty on you, get it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]我要拿你的赏金，明白吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyBillyTayback
Job's simple, but it could potentially get real messy if you can't manage a quick, silent takedown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作很简单，但如果你不能快速无声地拿下它，可能会变得非常麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybill_000192ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And hopefully you already got passage onto the Strip, 'cause that's where you can find your target. On the bright side, he's not personally dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你已经去过长街了，因为在那里你可以找到你的目标。往好的方面想，他个人并不危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybill_000192ca_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have fun. Or don't. I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩得开心，或者不开心，我也不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybill_000192ca_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBillyTaybackQuest 10
How about Billy Tayback? [100 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 比利·泰拜克怎么样？[100瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good. I think there's a lesson here: Don't go around fucking married women. Also, it's probably inadvisable to be a fatass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很好。我觉得这是个教训，别跟已婚女人乱搞。也不要变成个死胖子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybill_000192cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBillyTaybackQuest 30
Tayback is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰拜克已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyDickJohnson
Oh man, I'm a little jealous. Here's a kill that'll guarantee you a spot in heaven, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢伙计，我有点嫉妒了。杀了他，你就能上天堂了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydick_000192cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna get to kill a lawyer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去杀一个律师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydick_000192cf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, just sign hear and slide some money my way, and... Alright, this scumbag is all yours. Happy hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你只要签字同意，给我一些钱，然后...好吧，这个人渣交给你了。狩猎快乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydick_000192cf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDickJohnsonQuest 10
How about Dick Johnson? [200 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪克·约翰逊怎么样？[200瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you killed a lawyer that primarily specializes in keeping a family of politicians from having to face justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要杀了一名律师，他的专长是保护政客家族免受法律制裁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydick_000192d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose the reward money is just the icing, huh? Either way, here you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那笔赏金只是锦上添花，对吧？不管怎样，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydick_000192d0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDickJohnsonQuest 30
Dick's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迪克已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyLegion
Pretty open and shut, isn't it? Legion is evil, and they need to be destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单明了，不是吗？军团是邪恶的，他们需要被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "No way, Joe Tully. The Legion is, like, morally gray, man. Their methods may be brutal, but golly gee they sure made Arizona safer now!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “没这回事，乔·塔利。军团是，就像道德上的灰色，伙计。他们的方法可能很残忍，但天哪，他们现在肯定让亚利桑那变得更安全了！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People 'round here are so fucking stupid. They try to tell themselves the Legion isn't all bad, because the alternative scares them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人都他妈够蠢的。他们试图告诉自己军团并不全是坏的，因为其他的选项会让他们害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody gets their pussies all twisted over Fiends, or Jackals, or other gangs, so worthless that they don't warrant me remembering their names.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有哪个娘娘腔会被恶魔帮搞得一团糟，或者豺狼帮，还是其他帮派，他们毫无价值，不值得我记住他们的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "But the Legion claims to be the great counter to the NCR, so surely they can't be all bad." Fuck, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: “但是军团声称自己是NCR的伟大对手，所以他们当然不可能都是坏的。”操，傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, they're a nation of slavers that entertains itself by crucifying POWs and raping anything female they get their hands on, age be damned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，他们是一个奴隶制政权，通过钉死战俘和强奸落在他们手上的一切女性来取乐，该死的时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How noble they are, committing genocide on tribal cultures that refuse to fold and become the newest batch of slave-soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是多么的高贵，对那些拒绝屈服成为奴隶或者士兵的部落进行种族灭绝。
