ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The notion that a big-ass nation can be entirely evil scares people so bad, they pretend the Legion must have positive points.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个如此庞大的政权是完全邪恶的，这个概念把人们吓坏了，所以他们骗自己军团一定有正面的部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet, the only justification for that bit of genius is, invariably, some fuckin' bullshit about safe roads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这些天才能想到的唯一理由，总是一些关于道路安全的狗屁废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "I was ripped from my home at the age of five. I watched them rape my mom and burn my dad alive. Then they tortured me and forced me to train."
ESP.TRADUIT: “我五岁的时候就被人从家里抢走了。我看着他们强奸我妈妈，活活烧死我爸爸。然后他们折磨我，强迫我训练。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "They forced me to kill innocent people, under threat of crucifixion. But I don't hold a grudge, because fuckin' safe roads."
ESP.TRADUIT: “他们以被钉死在十字架上为威胁，强迫我杀害无辜的人。但我并不怀恨在心，因为他妈的道路变安全了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking retards. People are too goddamn stupid for their own goods, I swear to god.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的白痴。我对天发誓，有的人蠢到搞不清什么才是自己的利益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylegi_00019999_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyCultistRandall
Folk have been vanishing on some road up north of Vegas. And it's happened enough for people to start figuring there's a connection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人在北维加斯的路上失踪了。这种情况发生了很多次，人们开始发现其中的关联。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either there's a really sneaky sinkhole in the road, or something is grabbing the people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么是路上有个十分隐蔽的地洞，要么就是有什么东西在抓人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a075_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when you get dozens of people, all vanishing without a trace in a single area, well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你发现几十个人都在同一个地方消失得无影无踪的时候，嗯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a075_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best bring your elephant guns, all I'm saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是，最好带上你的猎象枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a075_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCultistRandallQuest 10
What's this North Vegas missing-persons contract? [3000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 北维加斯失踪人口合同是什么？[3000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some kinda devil-worshipper with no skin, and his pack of feral ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个没了皮的魔鬼崇拜者，还有他的一群野蛮食尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's a new one on me, I'll give you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，那对我来说可是个新闻，我会给你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a076_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here's your money. You more than earned it, cleaning up... whatever the fuck that mess was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱。这是你应得的，清理干净了...不管那是什么乱七八糟的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycult_0001a076_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCultistRandallQuest 30
I dealt those disappearances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些失踪案我已经处理了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrazyJohhnySayWhat
Why not? You're not the first ghost to ever speak with me. So many of them. Some were made by me, but not all of them. But they all speak to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不是？你不是第一个和我说话的鬼魂，太多了。有些是我杀的有些不是，但他们都对我说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnys_0001ac8c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everywhere I go, east or north or up or down, I'm followed by a wind of invisible voices. You're just a little dead voice in a living body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我所到之处，或东或北，或上或下，都有一阵看不见的声音尾随着我。你不过是一具活生生的躯壳里的一个死气沉沉的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnys_0001ac8c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I don't think you're talking to whoever you think you're talking to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我觉得你并没有在和想跟你沟通的人说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrazyJohhnyCrazy
Why, because of what I do and say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，就因为我的言行吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the first man looked into the first microscope, he saw living things, so small and insignificant that we lack the ability to even see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当第一个人使用显微镜观察时，他看到了渺小而微不足道的生物，我们甚至无法用肉眼看到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did we call him a madman and string him up for the crows? Everyone knows about it now. It's one of the facts of life!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是不是叫他疯子然后把他吊起来喂乌鸦了？现在大家都知道了，这已经是生活的常识了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they say I'm insane for proposing the opposite. Oh yes, it's all true, though. I've seen it in my dreams. You're there, with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们说我提出相反的建议是疯了。哦，好吧，不过那些都是真的。我在梦里见过它。你在那里，和我在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, me the air, the ground, water. All of it. It's all just one grain of sand, stuck to the eye of a sleeping god. And when he wakes, we all die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，我，空气，土地，水。这一切不过是粘在沉睡的神眼睛上的一粒沙子。等他醒来，我们都会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you already know this, because I've told you before. We'll do this all again. Over and over, again and again. Forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你已经知道了，因为我之前告诉过你。我们再来一遍。一次又一次，一次又一次。直到永远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to kill each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想杀死彼此吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohhnyc_0001ac8e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you're obviously insane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你显然是疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrazyJohnnyAttack
But I already killed you. You just forgot about it. We'll do this again, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我已经杀了你，只是你不记得了。我们会再来一次的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohnnya_0001ac90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaCrazyJohnnyThugREF.enable
[Attack] That's enough psycho-bullshit out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]你这个神经病的废话够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCrazyJohnnyStop
You're the only one who tells me to stop. All of the others are telling me that I need to kill more. They say that it's the only way, you see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是唯一一个让我停下来的人。其他人都告诉我，我得杀更多的人。他们说这是唯一的办法，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohnnys_0001b28a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They told me to kill Sammy all those years ago, and when I did, they opened my eyes to what's really real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们多年前就让我杀了萨米，当我这么做的时候，他们让我看清了什么才是真实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohnnys_0001b28a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know that I'm right. You're in the dreams, so you and me, we know the same things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我说的是对的。你在梦里，所以你和我，我们所知的是相同的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohnnys_0001b28a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm going to kill you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我得再杀你一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Crazy Johnny Norton [06000DC5] (mod) Quest : ([0601AC88]aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest) It Never Ends EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaacrazyjo_aaacrazyjohnnys_0001b28a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaCrazyJohnnyThugREF.enable
I want you to stop terrorizing people here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你停止恐吓这里的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyCrazyJohnny
Some gibbering lunatic waylaying travelers near Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某个胡言乱语的疯子在普瑞姆附近伏击旅客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycraz_0001b28e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he's something of a sneaky bastard, but I doubt he'll be too tough for someone who knows what they're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然他是个鬼鬼祟祟的混蛋，但我怀疑对于一个知道自己在干什么的人来说，他不会太难对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycraz_0001b28e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's his report, and let me get that money from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他的报告，把那笔钱给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycraz_0001b28e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest 10
Alright, who or what is Crazy Johnny Norton? [400 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，谁或者什么东西是疯狂的约翰尼·诺顿？ [400瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, was he as crazy as the name suggests? Wait, nevermind, I just realized I don't care about some dead asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他真的像名字暗示的那样疯狂吗？等等，算了，我刚刚意识到我并不关心某个死去的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycraz_0001b28f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work, and here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycraz_0001b28f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCrazyJohnnyQuest 30
Johnny Norton is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰尼·诺顿已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPatrickStartCombat
There's nothing wrong with my bal- I'm a fucking leg- Gah! Fuck you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的蛋蛋一点问题都没有-我他妈的就是有条腿-嘎啊！操你妈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick Facebreaker [060010B2] (mod) Quest : ([0601B889]aaaPatrickFaceQuest) Punching Down EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult07\aaapatrick_aaapatrickstart_0001b88c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] The roid-rage isn't intimidating. You and your tiny balls are dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]你的暴怒并不吓人，和你的蛋蛋一起去死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPatrickWhatTheFuck
You chill out, you fucking pervert!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你冷静点，你这个该死的变态！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick Facebreaker [060010B2] (mod) Quest : ([0601B889]aaaPatrickFaceQuest) Punching Down EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult07\aaapatrick_aaapatrickwhatt_0001b88e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, I'm gonna punch you until your entire fucking head is paste!
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了，我要把你打到整个脑袋都成浆糊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrick Facebreaker [060010B2] (mod) Quest : ([0601B889]aaaPatrickFaceQuest) Punching Down EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult07\aaapatrick_aaapatrickwhatt_0001b88e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Jesus Christ, chill the fuck out, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，他妈的冷静点，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyPatrickFace
I was told this guy has "the fastest fists in Reno" which... Yeah, that name in that town... I was pretty sure it was a porn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，这个人拥有“里诺最快的拳头”......是的，那个名字在那个城里...我很确定那是色情片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullypatr_0001b891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, he's actually just a boxing cheat. That'll probably make him marginally more dangerous, but I'm sure you can shoot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，他只是个打拳击的骗子。这样可能会让他更危险一点，但我相信你可以杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullypatr_0001b891_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess he hangs out in a sewer, because he's a fucking weirdo, and fucking weird people enjoy sewers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他在下水道里游荡，因为他是个该死的怪人，而该死的怪人都喜欢下水道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullypatr_0001b891_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Happy hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 狩猎开心？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullypatr_0001b891_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPatrickFaceQuest 10
Alright, how about Patrick Facebreaker? [400 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那破相者帕特里克呢？[400瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hooray. Here's your cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万岁。这是你的现金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullypatr_0001b892_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPatrickFaceQuest 30
Patrick is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕特里克已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullySewerSatanist
It involves chem addicts living in and around the Vegas sewer network. That should give you some idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 涉及住在维加斯下水道网络里和附近的瘾君子。这应该能给你一些启发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysewe_0001be90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some day-drinking hobo lunatic put this contract on my desk, but he also paid me in advance, so fuck it. I guess Charlie's gonna die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个整天酗酒的流浪汉疯子把这份合同放在我桌上，但他还提前付了钱，所以去他妈的。我猜查理要死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysewe_0001be90_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSewerSatanistQuest 10
Alright, I'll bite. What in god's name is the "Funky Charlie" contract? [500 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我咬钩了。"时髦查理"的合约是什么？[500瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry you had to deal with... Whatever the fuck that was about. Maybe some money will make you feel better. It usually does the trick for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉让你处理...不管那他妈的是怎么回事。也许钱能让你感觉好点，它通常对我很管用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysewe_0001be91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSewerSatanistQuest 30
Funky Charlie is dead and... I guess buried, technically. Underground, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 时髦查理死了，不对...技术上来说，应该是埋了...在地底...随便了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyBlindHenry
Okay, now I could make a pithy joke about sending you to hunt down a blind man, but in all seriousness, this guy needs to be put down, ASAP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在我可以开个小玩笑，说让你去追捕一个盲人，但说真的，这个人必须尽快被干掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyblin_000202f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever since he got his eyes gouged out of his skull, ol' Henry lives for nothing more than murder and torture and rape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从他的眼睛被挖出头骨后，老亨利的生活就只剩下谋杀、折磨和强奸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyblin_000202f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a sick shit, and for the good of humanity, he needs to be destroyed. Just, for your own sake, don't let him sneak up on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个变态，为了人类的福祉，他需要被消灭。为了你自己的话，别让他偷偷靠近你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyblin_000202f8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBlindHenryQuest 10
Alright, I'll take the contract for Blind Henry. [3000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我接下瞎子亨利的合同。[3000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: And glad I am to hear it. Men like him need to be put down. I wouldn't even inflict that asshole on my worst enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴听到这个消息。像他这样的人应该被消灭，我甚至不会把那个混蛋扔给我最大的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyblin_000202f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBlindHenryQuest 30
I killed Blind Henry. Decent fighter, for a man with no eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了瞎子亨利，作为一个没有眼睛的人，他还算是个像样的战士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyBodeanClan
The patriarch of a white-trash family of moonshiners, living up in the hills to the north of Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个白人垃圾私酒贩子家庭的族长，住在维加斯北部的山上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybode_0002250e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like they've decided that whole region is their private property, and anyone who wanders by is a trespasser to be shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来他们认定整个地区都是他们的私人财产，任何路过的人都是擅闯民宅的人，都将被枪决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybode_0002250e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I have no qualms with shooting trespassers, but these fuckers are just using that as pretext. They're nothing more than highwaymen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对射杀非法侵入者没有任何意见，但这些混蛋只是把这个当借口，他们只不过是拦路强盗罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybode_0002250e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, seems only fair to put them in the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，把他们埋到土里才公平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybode_0002250e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBodeanClanQuest 10
Who's this Bubba Bodean guy? [1000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个布巴·博代安是谁？[1000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work. And hopefully, none of Bubba's many, many relatives will come to exact bloody vengeance on you and/or your loved ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。希望布巴的很多很多亲戚不会来对你或者你的亲人进行血腥报复。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullybode_0002250f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBodeanClanQuest 40
I killed Bubba Bodean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了布巴·博代安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyDannyPoison
Nope. That was my question when I got this contract, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这也是我拿到合同时的疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydann_00023dde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just some low-rent chem pusher. Apparently, his product is so terrible that it keeps killing his customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是个垃圾化学药物经销商。很显然，他的产品太糟糕了，以至于他的顾客不断被他的产品害死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydann_00023dde_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad business model, as exemplified by the fact that you're gonna find him and convince him to stop breathing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕的商业模式，事实证明你会找到他并说服他停止呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydann_00023dde_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDannyPoisonQuest 10
Danny the Duck? Did somebody place a bounty on a waterfowl? [750 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 鸭子丹尼？有人悬赏一只水鸟？[750瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he turn into a giant radioactive mallard and try to beat you to death with his shitty blunt beak?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是不是变成了一只巨大的放射性野鸭还想用他那破嘴把你打死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydann_00023ddf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, here's your payout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydann_00023ddf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDannyPoisonQuest 30
I killed Danny the Duck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了“鸭子”丹尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyGoodspringsGary
Right here, we're going to be preventing another god-awful radio station from going on the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在这里，我们要阻止另一个神憎鬼厌的电台凯伯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fucking hate the radio. I don't even want that shitty jukebox in the lounge, but I kept getting idiots telling me to get one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真他妈讨厌电台，我甚至根本不想要休息室里那该死的自动点唱机，但一直有白痴叫我去买。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear to god, there're like ten songs in existence, and both of the stations we get play them. Makes me want to stab myself in the ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对天发誓，好像总共有十首歌，而我们的两家电台都在播放。我都想戳聋我自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you go find this Gary son-of-a-bitch, and you terminate him with extreme prejudice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你去找这个狗娘养的加里，然后用极端的偏见终结他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest 10
Goodsprings Gary? Is that a mascot or something? [50 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇加里？那是吉祥物还是什么？[50瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank fucking god. The airwaves are already oversaturated with this Johnny Guitar bullshit, I refuse to allow anyone to make it worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢他妈的上帝。广播里已经充斥着Johnny Guitar这种狗屎了，我不允许任何人把事情搞得更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you right now, if I ever find out where Mr. New Vegas is broadcasting from, his days will be numbered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就可以告诉你，如果我找到新维加斯先生的广播地址，他的日子就屈指可数了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygood_000243e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest 30
I guess you could say that Goodsprings Gary's station is... dead air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你可以说清泉镇加里的电台是...停播了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckWhatDo
You, uh... You serious? I just told you. I'm selling drugs. Would you like to purchase some drugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，呃...你认真的吗？我刚告诉你了。我是卖毒品的，你想买些毒品吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckwha_00026292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckOverdose
Yeah, well, I don't think I should be held responsible for other people overindulging. I always say the same thing, man: Enjoy in moderation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我不认为我应该为其他人的过度放纵负责。我总是说同样的话，伙计，适度享受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckove_00026294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not everyone buying cheap chems from a dude under a bridge are paragons of restraint and common sense. That's on them, my man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是所有从桥下的家伙那里购买廉价药品的人都是克制和常识的典范。那是他们的责任，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckove_00026294_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure that's a good idea. I've heard your customers have a habit of dropping dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定这是不是个好主意，我听说你的顾客经常会猝死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckStopSelling
No, and you know why? Because as long as the human species exists, there'll be a demand for this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，你知道为什么吗？因为只要有人类存在，这种东西就会有需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyducksto_00026296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always gonna be a demand, so as long as I can keep the supply going, I'll be making money hand over fist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总是会有需求的，所以只要我能保证供应，我就能赚大钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyducksto_00026296_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way I could convince you to stop selling to people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有没有可能说服你不再卖这些东西给别人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckEnabling
No, it doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。没有。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckena_00026298_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just enabling gangs like the Fiends. That doesn't bother you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是在纵容像恶魔帮这样的帮派，你不介意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckCombat
Yeah? Hey guys, we got some NCR fucker in here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？嘿，伙计们，这里有个NCR的混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckcom_0002629a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaDannyTheDuckFaction PlayerFaction
[Attack] There's a price on your head, and I'm here to collect.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]有人悬赏要你的人头，我是来收钱的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckWeirdName
I can fly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyduckwei_0002629c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you the Duck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们叫你鸭子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDannyDuckSupply
I have my sources. Why would I tell you? It'd be bad for business if I just went around telling the details to random assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有我的情报，我为什么要告诉你？如果我到处把细节告诉那些混球，对生意没有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Danny the Duck [0602377F] (mod) Quest : ([06023DDB]aaaDannyPoisonQuest) Thread the Needle EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult05\aaadannypo_aaadannyducksup_0002629f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And where are you getting your supply from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你们从哪里获得物资的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFleeceToBusiness
Oh, well, I'm right here behind this door, with my friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，我就在这扇门后，和我的朋友们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecetobusi_00027bd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We always enjoy a good fight, so let me just open that door for you, and then we can try and kill each other, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们喜欢公平决斗，所以让我为你打开那扇门，然后我们可以试着杀掉对方，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecetobusi_00027bd5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, come on in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，进来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecetobusi_00027bd5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFiendFleeceREF.enable aaaFleeceInteriorDoorREF.Unlock aaaFleeceInteriorDoorREF.SetOpenState 1
I'm here to kill Fleece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来杀弗利斯的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFleeceWhatsUp
Yeah, speaking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，请讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecewhatsu_00027bd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're definitely not a Fiend, though. I don't know your face, and only other Fiends come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你绝对不是恶魔帮的人。我不知道你的长相，而且只有其他恶魔帮才会来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecewhatsu_00027bd8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're probably after the price on my head, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你可能是冲着我头上的赏金来的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecewhatsu_00027bd8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, cool. Me and my friends here love a good fight, so lemme just open that door for you, and we can see about killing each other, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，很酷。我和我的朋友们喜欢好好打一架，所以让我为你打开那扇门，然后我们就可以看看如何杀死对方了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecewhatsu_00027bd8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This'll be great, it's really atmospheric in here. Great place for a gunfight. Alright, there's the door, so come on in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是太棒了，这里很有气氛，是枪战的好地方。好了，门开了，进来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [06026FB3] (mod) Quest : ([06027BD2]aaaFiendFleeceQuest) The Fiery Gates EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult03\aaafiendfl_aaafleecewhatsu_00027bd8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaFiendFleeceREF.enable aaaFleeceInteriorDoorREF.Unlock aaaFleeceInteriorDoorREF.SetOpenState 1
I'm looking for someone named Fleece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫弗利斯的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyFleece
Alright, then. Now, I'm sure you're no stranger to killing Fiends, but this one is just a little different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我知道你对杀死恶魔帮并不陌生，但这次有点不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, old Fleece here is some kinda of mechanical genius. He's been working his ass off to get the Fiends better armed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，老弗利斯是个机械天才。他一直在努力让恶魔帮的装备变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, while this guy is making the Fiends even more dangerous than usual, the bigger issue is the Gun Runners fucking hate competition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当这家伙把恶魔帮弄得比平常更危险的时候，更大的问题是军火贩子的仇恨竞争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as there are independents running around knowing how to manufacture guns, the Gun Runners are going to be mildly unhappy. And still rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要听说有知道如何制造枪支的独立人士，军火贩子就会有点不高兴。他们还很有钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFiendFleeceQuest 10
I'll take the contract on Fleece. [2500 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要签关于弗利斯的合同。[2500瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good, that's a relief. We wouldn't want those maniacs to be too well-armed. Or, even worse, for the Gun Runners to make slightly less money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，我松了一口气，我们可不想让那些疯子全副武装。或者，更糟糕的是，让军火贩子稍微少赚点钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of money, here's your payout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到钱，这是你的酬劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyflee_00027bf5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFiendFleeceQuest 30
I killed Fleece. He was weirdly nice about the whole thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了弗利斯，在这整件事上他奇怪地爽快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugManOpenDoorTEST
You got it bro!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做到了，兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Herculad [060162CC] (mod) Quest : ([0600BC77]aaaContractsGenericDialogue) 0600BC77 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest.aaaContractsCompleted to aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest.aaaContractsCompleted + 30
Herculad, unlock all tiers for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赫库拉德，为我解开所有的层级！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyQuestions
Alright, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyques_0002a5e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你几个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyBackground
I'm good with a gun, I don't have any moral objections to killing, and I can't stand tedious day-to-day work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很擅长用枪，我对杀人没有任何道德上的反感，我不能忍受乏味的日常工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyback_0002a5e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good money to be made, so I kept at it. Now I'm getting older and the work ain't slowing down, so fuck it, I can sub-contract and profit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赚了不少钱，所以我坚持了下来。现在我老了，工作没变少，所以去他妈的，我可以转包，还能赚钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyback_0002a5e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get into this business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么进入这个行业的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyNCR
Bad for business. That's my biggest problem with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对生意不利，这是我和他们最大的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at what they did to California. They police their own shit and penalize vigilantism. Hard for a business like mine to prosper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看他们对加州做了什么。他们监督自己的破事，惩罚私刑，像我这样的生意要成功可不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aside from that, I suppose they're alright. I mean, the top-level people are all fucking retards, but grading on a whole, they're not bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我觉得他们还行。我的意思是，顶层的人都是他妈的弱智，但总体来说他们还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They really are handling the Mojave in the dumbest possible way, though. God damn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，他们真的是在用最愚蠢的方式处理莫哈维。这该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They show up in someone's town, uninvited. They declare that the town is part of them now, and it has to abide by their rules and pay their taxes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不请自来地出现在别人的镇上，然后宣布该镇现在归他们统治，必须遵守他们的规则，缴纳税款。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if that town has trouble with bandits or what have you? "Sorry, we're stretched too thin." No wonder locals fucking hate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那个城镇有什么强盗之类的麻烦呢？“对不起，我们人手太少了。”难怪当地人他妈的讨厌他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, overall, they're decent folk. Look, they got a giant army with exactly one war crime under their belt. Pretty good track record.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，总的来说，他们是正派的人。你看，他们有一支庞大的军队却只犯过一次战争罪，非常了不起的记录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyncr_0002a5e8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyWhyTiers
aaaJoeTullyJaredRoss
Ross? Alright, well, he needs to be taken down ASAP, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗斯？好吧，我们得尽快把他拿下，这是肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjare_0002abe7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotta be careful with this one, though. Ross isn't some junkie with a good shooting arm. Man's a professional, and cold-blooded as they come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这次得小心点。罗斯不但是一个枪法很好的瘾君子，而且是专业的，冷血的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjare_0002abe7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He got himself kicked out of the military on account of his psychopathic bloodlust, but the man's still a hell of a sniper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他被军队开除是因为他的嗜血心理，但他还是个厉害的狙击手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjare_0002abe7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch your ass, all I'm saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意你的屁股，我想说的是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjare_0002abe7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJaredRossQuest 10
Jared Ross. [3000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 贾里德·罗斯。 [3000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank Christ. You know you fucked up if the NCR and the Great Khans want you to die screaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢基督。如果你知道NCR和大汗帮想让你尖叫着去死就代表你搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjare_0002abe8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJaredRossQuest 30
I killed Ross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了罗斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyCasaGrace
Oh, you know. Some rich girl gets herself kidnapped by ambitious idiots. Now there's some kinda fucked-up hostage exchange going down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你懂的。一个有钱的女孩被野心勃勃的白痴绑架了，现在要去进行一场该死的人质交换。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycasa_0002bde8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone is trying to fuck each other over, everyone wants the girl for themselves. It's gonna be a shitshow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都想把对方弄死，每个人都想把那个女孩占为己有。这将是一场闹剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycasa_0002bde8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone wants you to blast in there, kill the guys facilitating the hostage exchange, and cut the girl free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人想让你冲进去，杀掉那些协助人质交换的人，然后放了那个女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycasa_0002bde8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCasaGraceRescue 10
What's the deal with the Grace Lancaster rescue? [4000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 营救格蕾丝·兰开斯特是怎么回事？[4000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? You overcomplicate shit, you end up in a four-way shootout, no one has cash, and no one has leverage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？你把事情搞得太复杂了，结果就成了四方枪战，没人有钱，也没人有筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullycasa_0002bde9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCasaGraceRescue 50
I got Grace out of there in one piece.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把格蕾丝完好无损地救出来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeyMayesWhatNow
Why, this overpass right here! This thing has been standing for over 200 years, and still as solid as ever. That's fine workmanship, right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，这个立交桥就在这里！这东西已经屹立了两百多年，仍然像以前一样坚固。这就是精湛的工艺，就在这。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymayeswha_0002bded_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And talk about location! This baby leads directly into Novac, one of the most promising towns in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说位置！这条宝贝线路直接通向诺瓦克，莫哈维沙漠最有前途的城镇之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymayeswha_0002bded_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can ask anyone, with times being what they are, local commerce is doing better than ever. Novac is heading straight for the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以问任何人，随着时代的发展，诺瓦克的商业比以前更繁荣。诺瓦克正在走向巅峰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymayeswha_0002bded_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the right kinda person were to hold it... They could make an absolute killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是合适的人拥有它...他们可以大赚一笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymayeswha_0002bded_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you on about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeyMaysSeriously
Well, alright, you got me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧，被你发现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joey Mays, pleasure to meet you. You see, I happen to own this bit of land, and everything built on it. Namely, the bridge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔伊·梅斯，很高兴认识你。你看，我碰巧拥有这片土地，以及在上面建造的一切，也就是这座桥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's been in the family for years, but I gotta be honest... I need a change of scenery. I'm thinking east. Far east, past the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们家族已经拥有它很多年了，但我得说实话...我需要换个环境。我想去东方，远东，穿过军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things over here... Well, it's just so complicated, you know? Lot of layers, all sorts of interesting things are happening. It's stressful!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的事...太复杂了，你懂吗？有很多层次，各种有趣的事情都在发生，压力太大了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The East Coast, though... The people are simple, life is dull, and nothing particularly interesting is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，东海岸...那里的人很简单，生活很枯燥，没有什么特别有趣的事情发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so, I figured I'd fund my trip by selling off the old family bridge. What do you say, friend? It's yours, only 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我想我可以卖掉我们家族那座古老的桥梁来资助我的旅行。你说呢，朋友？卖给你的话，只要500瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysseri_0002bdef_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, are you trying to sell me this bridge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，你是想把这座桥卖给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeyMaysIntelligenceCheck
Fantastic! Just give me the money, and here's your deed. Great doing business with you. Now, I'm off to the east!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！把钱给我，这是你的地契，和你做生意很愉快。现在，我要去东方了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysinte_0002bdf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaJoeyBridgeDeed 1 player.removeitem caps001 500 setstage aaaJoeyMaysQuest 20
This sounds like a great deal. I'll take it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这听起来是个不错的交易。我接受了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, well, it's definitely not a scam, though I understand why you might think it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，嗯，这绝对不是一个骗局，尽管我理解为什么你可能认为它是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysinte_0002bdf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may have been embellishing certain details to aid in my sales techniques, but a scam? No, I'd never do something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能为了提高销售成功率而对某些细节进行了润色，但是骗局？不，我绝不会做那种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysinte_0002bdf7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not interested in buying into your scam. It's not even a very good one. Way too obvious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的骗局不感兴趣，这甚至不是一个好的案例。太明显了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeyMaysCombat
Wait, what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymayscomb_0002bdf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] There's a price on your head. Just die quietly, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]有人悬赏要你的人头，安静地去死，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeyMaysGoAway
Really? God damn it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysgoaw_0002bdfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's so petty, can you believe that? Like I'm responsible for their buyers remorse? So they'll sink more cash into knocking me off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太小气了，你能相信吗/好像是我让他们后悔买了东西似的？好让他们花更多钱干掉我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysgoaw_0002bdfc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, well, screw this. I'm headed east, today. Here, take the bridge deed. I'm done with this stupid desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好吧，去他妈的。我今天就往东走，给，拿着桥的地契。我真是受够了这个愚蠢的沙漠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joey Mays [06005D76] (mod) Quest : ([0602BDEA]aaaJoeyMaysQuest) The Poor Stay Poor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaajoeymay_aaajoeymaysgoaw_0002bdfc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaJoeyBridgeDeed 1 setstage aaaJoeyMaysQuest 20
Well, it turns out that some people disagree, and they put a price on your head. Best move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明有些人不同意，他们悬赏要你的人头。最好向前看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaChunksBackground
Yeah... Thought I could join the Legion for real... They did this to me. Please, kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是...我以为我可以真正的加入军团...没想到他们却对我做了这些。请杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chunks Woodcock [06001F12] (mod) Quest : ([0602C9FE]aaaChunksWoodcockQuest) Hung EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult07\aaachunksw_aaachunksbackgr_0002ca01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you Chunks Woodcock? What happened to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是大块头伍德考克？你怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyChunksWoodcock
Alright, you ever wanted to kill a pornstar? Well, you're gonna get to kill a pornstar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你有没有想过杀一个色情明星？嗯，你将会有机会杀死一个色情明星。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychun_0002ca07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy walked off the set of his movie, and tried to join the Legion. I doubt he'll make it all the way to Cottonwood Cove, so this one'll be easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙离开了电影的片场，想加入军团。我怀疑他他能否一路走到棉白杨湾，所以这个活应该很容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychun_0002ca07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChunksWoodcockQuest 10
I'll take the contract for Chunks Woodcock. [200 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要签大块头伍德考克的合同。[200瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good. I'm sure at least one weirdo will pop in one of his films, and have a memorial wank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，很好。我敢肯定，至少会有一个怪人出现在他的电影里，然后打飞机作为纪念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychun_0002ca08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChunksWoodcockQuest 30
Woodcock is dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伍德考克已经被解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJeffHayesWhatDo
Well, let's see. Oh, wait, it turns out that it isn't any of your business. Bother someone else before I throw your ass out the window.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，来看看。哦，等等，原事实证明，这不关你的事。那麻烦你在我把你扔出窗外之前去打扰别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhay_aaajeffhayeswha_0002ca0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you guys doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJeffHayesBurningMan
That's adorable. Now why don't you turn around and walk back the way you came, before I lose my good mood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是可爱。现在你为什么不在我失去好心情之前，从你来的路走回去呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhay_aaajeffhayesbur_0002ca10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I'm here about a contract someone put on your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，我是因为一份合同才来的，有人买了你的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJeffHayesGuilty
You know, that does sound vaguely familiar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这听起来有点耳熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhay_aaajeffhayesgui_0002ca12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we were pretty drunk, and we have been known to douse assholes in gasoline and light 'em up. Want a demonstration?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我们当时喝得酩酊大醉，我们给那些混蛋灌汽油然后点着他们。想要我示范一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhay_aaajeffhayesgui_0002ca12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you guys attacked a caravan around here, recently. Sound familiar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你们最近在这里袭击了一个商队，听起来熟悉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJeffHayesCombat
You don't have much common sense, do you? That's alright, maybe I can teach you a few things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没什么常识，是吗？没关系，也许我可以教你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeff Hayes [06003062] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA09]aaaJeffHayesQuest) Burn Away the Goodness EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaajeffhay_aaajeffhayescom_0002ca14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player SetEnemy aaaJeffHayesFaction PlayerFaction
[Attack] I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击>我是来杀你的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGeoffSnyderHunting
Oh shit. I thought you guys were just trying to scare me when you said that stuff about... y'know, hunting me down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我操，我还以为你们说那些追杀我的事是吓唬我的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderh_0002ca1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was, y'know, just some harmless fun, right? And I've definitely learned my lesson, and I won't bother you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是，你懂的，一些无害的玩笑，对吧？而且我肯定已经吸取了教训，我不会再打扰你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderh_0002ca1b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, Geoff. I'm with Tully Headhunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，杰夫，我是塔利猎头的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGeoffSnyderPayUp
I don't have a job, how am I supposed to pay back anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都没工作了，我怎么还？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderp_0002ca1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, don't do anything crazy. Look, I have... Uh, five cartons of cigarettes. That I might have stolen. Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，别做疯狂的事。听着，我有...五盒香烟。是我偷来的，可能...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderp_0002ca1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, here you go. Here's everything in my pockets for you! I'm just going to go now. Away from here. Uh, goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，给你。我口袋里的东西都是给你的！我现在要走了，远离这里。呃，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderp_0002ca1d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGeoffSnyderQuest 20 player.additem CigaretteCarton 5 player.additem caps001 13 player.additem DinoToy 1 player.additem MilkBottle01 1 player.additem CoffeeMug01 3
I suppose I can let you keep all your teeth in your skull if you compensate me for my time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你补偿我浪费掉的时间，我想我可以留下你所有的牙齿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGeoffSnyderCombat
Wait, what? I was just joking around, you can't seriously be that upset over it, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，什么？我只是开个玩笑，你不会真的那么生气吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Geoff Snyder [06003C6F] (mod) Quest : ([0602CA17]aaaGeoffSnyderQuest) Keep Your Dignity EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult01default\aaageoffsn_aaageoffsnyderc_0002ca1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击>我是来杀你的。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyJeffHayes
Yep, you got yourself a murderer and a rapist here. Way too many of his kind around here, so lets cull the herd some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你给自己找了个杀人犯和强奸犯。这附近有太多这样的人了，所以让我们把这个群体削减一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjeff_0002ca25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Him and his douchebag friends are hanging around Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和他那帮混蛋朋友在巨石城闲逛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjeff_0002ca25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJeffHayesQuest 10
I'll take Jeff Hayes. [700 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我选杰夫·海耶斯。[700瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now watch as nobody in the universe mourns. Here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，宇宙中没有人会哀悼他。这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjeff_0002ca26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJeffHayesQuest 30
Jeff Hayes is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰夫·海耶斯已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyGeoffSnyder
Alright, this one is very exciting, because I set this one up. Some snot-nosed little punkass has been wasting my time with bullshit contracts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这很令人兴奋，因为我建立了这个，有个流鼻涕的小混球一直在用那些狗屁合同浪费我的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygeof_0002d627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's living in some shitty old apartment near North Vegas. I'd like it if you killed the fuck out of him, but I'll settle for lesser punitive action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他住在北维加斯附近的破公寓里，我希望你能杀了他，但是轻一点的惩罚我也能接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygeof_0002d627_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just make life unpleasant for him, at the very least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少让他的生活变得不愉快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygeof_0002d627_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGeoffSnyderQuest 10
Geoff Snyder sounds easy enough. [50 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰夫·斯奈德听起来很简单。[50瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I hope you killed him, and pissed on his grave. Here's your payout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我希望你杀了他，还在他坟上撒了尿。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygeof_0002d628_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGeoffSnyderQuest 30
That Snyder kid shouldn't bother you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个叫斯奈德的小子不会再来烦你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyWackoClown
You know, my top three list of least favorite things, it's the radio, it's people talking when I'm trying to talk, and fucking clowns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我最不喜欢的三样东西是什么吗？是电台、我说话时别人插嘴、还有该死的小丑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywack_0002d630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's that third thing we're going to be taking care of today. Now, there are accusations of murder and cannibalism... Total horrorshow, and such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们今天要处理的第三样。现在，有谋杀和吃人的指控...绝对的恐怖秀，等等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywack_0002d630_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But as far as I'm concerned, you put on that clown makeup, that's reason enough to hunt you down. So, go to North Vegas, and ice this clown fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就我来说，你化了小丑妆，这就足够让我追捕你了。所以现在就去北维加斯，把这个小丑变成冰冷的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywack_0002d630_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaWackoClownQuest 10
I see there's a contract for a... "pervert clown". [500 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到有一份合同...“变态小丑”。[500瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing holy fucking work right here. You've earned this payout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做着他妈的神圣的工作。这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywack_0002d631_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaWackoClownQuest 30
The clown is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小丑已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyChrisBlue
This one is fucking boring. "Oh no, we make chems, and this guy makes chems, so we want you to kill him."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个活太他妈无聊了。"哦，不，我们生产毒品，这个人也在制造毒品，所以我们想让你杀了他"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychri_0002fa17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Just go kill him or scare him off, or what the fuck ever. Goddamn drug cooks are a bunch of oversensitive little bitches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便你。去杀了他、吓跑他，或者随便你怎么处理。该死的制毒师就是一群敏感过头的小贱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychri_0002fa17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChrisBlueQuest 10
Chris Blue. [200 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 克里斯·布鲁。[200瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's super. Here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，那太棒了。 这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullychri_0002fa18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaChrisBlueQuest 30
Chris Blue won't be stepping on anyone's toes again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克里斯·布鲁不会再踩到任何人的脚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGoodspringsGaryOffline
You are absolutely right about that issue, listener, and it is a... significant, obnoxious problem that is really getting on my nerves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的很对，听众，这确实是...让我心烦意乱的恼人问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you see, the thing is, I only know how to play music and talk into a microphone. Getting radio waves set up is beyond me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，问题是，我只会放音乐和对着麦克风说话。我可搞不定无线电波。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I figured I'll just record some audio bits while I wait for my technician to figure out how to get us on the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我想我只需要录制一些音频片段，等待我的技术人员弄清楚如何让我们开始直播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But let me assure you, as soon as we're up and running, we're going to be all Goodsprings Gary in the Morning FM... For the rest... Of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我保证，只要我们把这些搞定，早间FM的所有时间都会属于清泉镇加里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa20_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you're actually on the air. I'm not getting any signal for your station.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为你真的在广播，我没有收到你这个电台的任何信号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGoodspringsGaryCombat
Off the air?! I think you must be an insane person, listener.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停播？！我觉得你一定是疯了，听众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're never going to go off the air! The world needs to hear the... wonderful sounds of Goodsprings Gary in the Morning FM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们永远不会停播的！这个世界需要在早上听到清泉镇加里的美妙声音！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not gonna take that kind of threat sitting down! That's right listeners, you're about to hear this guy get his ass kicked live, on the air!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会坐视这种威胁的！没错，听众们，你们将听到这家伙在直播中被狠狠揍一顿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Gary [060243D8] (mod) Quest : ([060243DC]aaaGoodspringsGaryQuest) Dead Air EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleadult09\aaagoodspr_aaagoodspringsg_0002fa22_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] There's a price on your head. I'm taking you off the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击]有人悬赏要你的人头，我要停止你的广播。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyTreasureLiddel
Congratulations, you get to cross the river into Legion territory for this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜你，这次你得过河进入军团的领地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullytrea_00030621_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, you probably won't actually have to interact with any of those fucking morons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，你可能根本不用和那些白痴打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullytrea_00030621_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you're looking for some kinda excavation site, and you're gonna kill the guy in charge. Have fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你要找的是某个挖掘现场，而且你要杀了负责的人。玩得开心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullytrea_00030621_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaTreasureLiddelQuest 10
I'll take the Mac Liddel contract. [3000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要接麦克·利德尔的合同。[3000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. While I despise banking entities, I'm more than willing to take their money. And if that means someone's gonna die, well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。虽然我鄙视银行实体，但我非常愿意接受他们的钱。如果这意味着有人会死，那么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullytrea_00030622_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you know what I mean. Case in point, here's your cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你明白我的意思。比如说，这是给你的现金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullytrea_00030622_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaTreasureLiddelQuest 30
I killed Liddel and stopped his operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了利德尔，阻止了他的行动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyJoeyMays
Alright, here's a nice, simple one. Some dude in Novac is running a con, and one of his satisfied customers wants satisfaction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是一个很简单的活。诺瓦克有个家伙在搞诈骗，有一个他的顾客想要得到清偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjoey_00030626_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be fooled by his extremely reputable first name, and you should be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别被他那声名显赫的名字迷惑了，你应该能搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjoey_00030626_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeyMaysQuest 10
I'm interested in the Joey Mays contract. [200 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对乔伊·梅斯的合同感兴趣。[200瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Hope it wasn't difficult for you, or you might need a new line of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。希望这对你来说不难，否则你可能需要换个工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjoey_00030627_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your money, and that's the end of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱，就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyjoey_00030627_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJoeyMaysQuest 30
I dealt with that con artist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我处理了那个骗子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyFindTargets
aaaJoeTullyKillConfirmed
aaaRachaelMcGovernWhoYou
aaaEugeneSchraderWelcome
aaaEugeneSchraderDesk
Alright, I suppose I would be disappointed if you were actually stupid enough to do as I asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想如果你真的蠢到照我说的做我会很失望的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We抣l do this the old-fashioned way. Open fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们用老办法解决吧，开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032465_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBullshitBrigadeREF.enable startcombat player aaaEugeneDeskTriggerREF.disable aaaEugeneChairTriggerREF.disable aaaEugeneTrapdoor1REF.Unlock aaaEugeneTrapdoor1REF.SetOpenState 1 aaaEugeneTrapdoor2REF.Unlock aaaEugeneTrapdoor2REF.SetOpenState 1
aaaEugeneSchraderSitDown
Very good. I knew we could be civil about all of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，我就知道我们可以文明地处理这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032a62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respect your open-mindedness and trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重你的开放态度和信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032a62_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, I'm afraid that traipsing right in where I want you was a poor strategic move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，在我想要的地方闲逛恐怕是一个糟糕的策略。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032a62_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eugene Schrader [06004237] (mod) Quest : ([06031E66]aaaEugeneSchraderQuest) Of All Ages EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\maleold01\aaaeugenes_aaaeugeneschrad_00032a62_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBullshitBrigadeREF.enable startcombat player aaaEugeneDeskTriggerREF.disable aaaEugeneChairTriggerREF.disable aaaEugeneTrapdoor1REF.Unlock aaaEugeneTrapdoor1REF.SetOpenState 1 aaaEugeneTrapdoor2REF.Unlock aaaEugeneTrapdoor2REF.SetOpenState 1
aaaBigPatShithouse
Eh. Maybe. I like honesty in advertising. Anyway, the people who rent rooms here aren't the kind to whine about a name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，也许吧，但我喜欢做诚实的广告。总之，在这里租房的人不会对名字发牢骚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatshitho_00036dda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously, this place is called the Shithouse Motel? Isn't that bad for business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，这地方叫茅坑汽车旅馆？这对生意不是很不好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBigPatRentRoom
Okay, 200 caps up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，200瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatrentro_00036ddc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一个房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBigPatYesRent
Okay. Go up the stairs, your room is the last door on the left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，上楼去，你的房间在左边最后一扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatyesren_00036dde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radios aren't allowed on the premises, unless someone kills Mr. New Vegas and gets some new songs on the fucking air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 电台是不允许在这里播放的，除非有人杀了新维加斯先生然后播放他妈的新歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatyesren_00036dde_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and don't freak out if some old guy wanders into your room. He does that, ever since his wife died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，如果有个老头走进你的房间，别吓坏了。自从他妻子死后，他就一直这样。
