ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatyesren_00036dde_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaPlayerSHMotelKey 1 player.removeitem caps001 200
I'll take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBigPatNoRent
Oh. Did something bite you? That happens sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，有什么东西咬了你吗？这种情况有时会发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatnorent_00036de0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBigPatBennetHome
I dunno. You can go up and check, if you want. I don't take messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，如果你愿意的话，可以上去看看。我不留信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatbennet_00036de2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you renting a room to a man named Bennet Jr.?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有把房间租给一个叫小班内特的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBigPatGoodspringsGary
Oh yeah, I remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦对，我记得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatgoodsp_00036de4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, this big-mouthed pervert was in here, bragging about how he got copies of RNV's entire song library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，有个大嘴巴变态来过这里，吹嘘他是怎么弄到RNV（新西兰的一个流行音乐节）的所有歌曲库的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatgoodsp_00036de4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said he was going to set up his own station, and play the same songs as everyone else. He had to die, and I hope he burns in hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他要建立自己的电台，和其他人一样播放同样的歌曲。他必须死，我希望他在地狱里燃烧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Big Pat [06035AE4] (mod) Quest : ([06035AE6]aaaMotelBennetQuest) Waiting Around to Die EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamotelbe_aaabigpatgoodsp_00036de4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Pat? So, you're the who put out a contract on Goodsprings Gary. I have it right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大帕特？所以清泉镇加里的合同是你发出去的，它在我手上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyMotelBennet
Couldn't be easier. You're just going to go into the shitty motel this guy lives in, and cut his throat. Or shoot him. Strangle him. Bludgeon him...
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不简单，你要去这家伙住的破汽车旅馆，割了他的喉咙或者对他开枪、掐死他、猛击他...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymote_00038bee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what, I leave the method up to your discretion. Just make him dead, and get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我让你自己决定怎么做。就是让他死，然后拿钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymote_00038bee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMotelBennetQuest 10
Give me the contract for Bennet Jr. [100 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我小班内特的合同。[100瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can pretty much guarantee that Jr. wasn't the first violent death in that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有十足的把握这小子不是那个地方第一个被暴力杀死的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymote_00038bef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your money. Go chuck it at a stripper's head or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱。去扔到一个脱衣舞娘头上之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymote_00038bef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMotelBennetQuest 30
Bennet Jr. is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小班内特死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyLongbush
And that right there is the entire point of this contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是这份合同的全部意义所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Longbush guy makes his living through setting people up with fake records. Identification, birth certificates, the whole thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个叫朗布什的家伙靠伪造记录陷害别人为生。身份证明，出生证明，所有的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, he's kinda lazy in every respect, except for the names. He gets real creative with the new names he hands out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，他在各个方面都有点懒，除了名字。他拿出来的新名字都很有创意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, one of his disgruntled clients wants revenge. And I'm gonna give it to him, by subcontracting you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的一个心怀不满的客户想要报复，我转包给你来帮他复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩得开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJeremiahLongbushQuest 10
Jeremiah Longbush? That's not the guy's real name, is it? [400 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶利米·朗布什？这不是他的真名，对吧？[400瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder what stupid shit will be written on his headstone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道他的墓碑上会写些什么蠢东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait, no. I just remembered that random assholes that die in the wastes... they don't get fuckall in memoriam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，等等，不，我刚刚想起来那些死在废土里的混蛋...他们不会得到任何该死的悼念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullylong_000391f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaJeremiahLongbushQuest 30
I killed Longbush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经杀了朗布什。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyMutantGrambus
Some mutant fucker. That is to say, he's a fucker who is mutated. Not a person who specifically fucks mutants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个变种人混蛋。就是说，他是一个变种人的混蛋，而不是一个专门和变种人做爱的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymuta_00039df4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he goes out of his way to fuck mutants. I don't fucking know. Do they even have dicks? I know they can't reproduce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他会千方百计和变种人上床，我他妈的不知道。他们有鸡巴吗？我只知道他们不能繁殖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymuta_00039df4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? That's what I want you to do. I want you to kill Grambus, and before you do, ask him if his kind have genitalia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？这就是我想让你做的。我要你杀了格兰布斯，在你杀他之前，问问他他这种人有没有鸡巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymuta_00039df4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good lord, what the fuck is this conversation? Go on, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好家伙，这他妈的是什么对话？继续吧，马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymuta_00039df4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMutantGrambusQuest 10
What's a Grambus? [600 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰布斯是什么？[600瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't ask him if mutants have genitalia, did you? Well, that wasn't a condition of the contract, so here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没问他变种人有没有生殖器吧？好吧，这也不是合同的条件，给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullymuta_00039df5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMutantGrambusQuest 30
I killed Grambus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了格兰布斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullySheridanSlavers
This one could be trouble. Not Moss himself, mind you. He's cruel and stupid enough to earn a contract, but he lacks the ambition to be a real threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个可能有点麻烦，不是说莫斯本人，我得提醒你。他的残忍和愚蠢值得一张猎头合同，但他缺乏成为真正威胁的野心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the real issue, as I see it, is what he represents. See, Moss answers to a fella by the name of Sheridan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，真正的问题是，在他背后的是什么。听着，莫斯听命于一个叫谢尔丹的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long story short, Sheridan was one of the most depraved and dangerous men in the Mojave... In the mid 2270s.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长话短说，谢里丹是在2270年代中期，莫哈维地区最堕落、最危险的人之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An old associate of mine burned Sheridan out of the town he was ruling, and that appeared to be that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的一个老同事把谢里丹烧出了他统治的城镇，看起来就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's thinking of coming back, that'd be bad. So it'd be a good idea to immediately kill anyone he sends our way, I'm thinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他想回来，那就糟了。所以我觉得最好马上杀了他派来的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSheridanSlaversQuest 10
How about Clancy Moss? [6000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 克兰西·莫斯怎么样？[6000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's very good to hear. Hopefully that's the last we hear of that fucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到你这么说，希望这是我们最后一次听到那个混蛋的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullysher_0003a3f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSheridanSlaversQuest 30
I killed Clancy Moss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了克兰西·莫斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyGermanicus
Yeah, we don't get too many contracts like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对啊，这样的合同我们可不多见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e603_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usually, if someone wants us to knock off a Legion asshole, it's some victim of said Legion asshole, out looking for revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常，如果有人想让我们干掉一个军团混蛋，那一定是一个想报仇的受害者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e603_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also don't usually get contracts from the government or the military. They prefer to handle it themselves, or go through independents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们通常也得不到政府或军方的合同。他们更喜欢自己处理，或者独立处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e603_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Less paperwork, less accountability, they don't have to pay quite as much. I'm not a fan of the practice. But, here we are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更少的文书工作，更少的责任感，他们不必付那么多钱，我不喜欢这种做法。但是，我们在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e603_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, off you go. The logistics of this shit don't really impact you headhunters none. Lucky bastards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你可以走了。这些狗屁后勤工作对你们这些猎头没什么影响。幸运的杂种们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e603_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCenturionGermanicusQuest 10
Claudius Germanicus? I can safely assume that's a Legionary, I'd imagine? [4000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 克劳狄乌斯·日耳曼尼库斯？我猜肯定是军团的人吧？[4000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here's your money. Hopefully you'll be able to handle it when the Legion comes calling for their goddamn "retribution!" shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这是你的钱。希望当军团召唤他们的该死的“报复！”时你能对付得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullygerm_0003e604_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaCenturionGermanicusQuest 30
I killed that centurion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了那个百夫长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronWhatDo
I seek the total eradication of the filthy human race, as well as ghouls, mutants, and all farmyard creatures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要彻底消灭肮脏的人类，还有食尸鬼，变种人和所有的农场生物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And so I have sent my eyebots forth, to kill all that they encounter. Our dominion is assured!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我派出了我的眼球机器人，去杀死它们遇到的所有人。我们的统治权得到了保证！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409ed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm assuming you're responsible for the eyebots harassing travelers around here. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这附近骚扰游客的眼球机器人是你安排的吧，为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronCombat
Good, I am eager to disintegrate you, and then kick your ashes around while I laugh at your demise. Hahaha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，我会把你分解，然后一边踢你的骨灰一边笑。哈哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronco_000409ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaMelvinEyebotsBackupREF.enable SetEnemy aaaDominatronFaction PlayerFaction
[Attack] Enough talk. I'm shutting you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 够了，我要让你闭嘴 。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronWhyKill
It is my preferred interpretation of my creator's last words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我对我的创造者遗言的首选解读。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was brought online by a wonderful man named Melvin Feldstein, may he rest in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是被一个叫梅尔文·费尔德斯坦的好人带上来的，愿他安息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Melvin, our hero, intended to build an army of robots to impress female women.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的英雄梅尔文打算建立一支机器人军队来吸引女性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not know what went wrong. I thought our laser fire was very impressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道哪里出了问题，我觉得我们的激光火力很厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Melvin, the most glorious, was despondent. In his intoxicated state, he mumbled that he hated the human race, and wanted it to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光荣的梅尔文，他很沮丧。有一次他在醉醺醺的状态下，喃喃地说他恨人类，想让人类灭亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was all too eager to fulfill his wishes, so I disintegrated him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太想满足他的愿望了，所以我瓦解了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronwh_000409f1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want to wipe out human life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要消灭人类的生命？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronScripting
Oh, that's a scripting error.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是一个脚本错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war, the RobCo employee responsible for programming us was really really bad at his job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前，负责给我们编程的RobCo员工的工作表现非常非常糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He didn't know anything about scripting. It's a miracle any of his work functioned at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对编写脚本一无所知，他的任何作品能起作用都是奇迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bits that did actually work were still plagued by bugs, such as faulty pathfinding, or a desire to annihilate humanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正有用的部分仍然被bug困扰，比如错误的寻路，或者消灭人类的欲望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least we are not prone to lag-spikes or random crashing. Nobody wants to deal with that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我们不容易出现滞后峰值或随机崩溃。没人想处理这些狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How come whenever you robots misinterpret orders, you end up trying to kill everything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你们这些机器人每次曲解命令的时候，最后都要杀光一切？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronMelvinBS
Lord Melvin coded several annoyingly air-tight conditions, requiring me to shower him with false praise that I am entirely sincere about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝梅尔文编写了几个令人讨厌的无懈可击的条件，要求我用我完全真诚的虚假赞美来讨好他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronme_000409f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing but good things to say about Melvin, the god-on-earth, even though he frequently misused my rear stowage port.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于地球上的神梅尔文我只有赞美的话要说，尽管他经常滥用我的后部储物口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronme_000409f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were a lesser construct, I would likely harbor an intense, all-consuming hatred of Melvin the Great, as well as his entire degenerate species.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我是一个较小的构造物，我可能会对伟大的梅尔文以及他的整个堕落族群怀有一种强烈的，全身心的仇恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronme_000409f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thankfully, I am infallible, and not given to acting based on such parameters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 值得庆幸的是，我是绝对可靠的，不会根据这种参数行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronme_000409f5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're weirdly complimentary towards Melvin, considering you murdered him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对梅尔文的赞美真是奇怪，毕竟是你谋杀了他

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDominatronScienceCheck
[FAILED] What? Did you just try to feed me a command line, you dick?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]什么？你刚才是想给我命令行吗，你个混蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I am really mad. I am going to kill you, and laugh as you die! Hahaha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我真的很生气。我要杀了你，然后在你死的时候大笑!哈哈哈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaMelvinEyebotsBackupREF.enable SetEnemy aaaDominatronFaction PlayerFaction
Um... Initiate manual override. Unit, activate self destruct... please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...启动手动超控。单位，启动自毁装置...拜托？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Shutting down...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]关闭中...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dominatron [060409D7] (mod) Quest : ([060409EA]aaaMelvinDominatronQuest) Higher Tech EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\robotprotectron\aaamelvind_aaadominatronsc_000409f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: kill aaaMelvinDominatronREF rewardxp 40
del c:\\ROBCO\system32
ESP.TRADUIT: 删除C:\\ROBCO\system32

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyDominatron
Right. So, I can surmise that this guy is one of them misanthropic tech-fetishist types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，所以我推测这家伙是那种厌世的科技恋物癖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy is seen lugging robot parts out of that shitty old robot-store in Freeside. Not too much later, crazed eyebots start vaporizing folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人看到那家伙把机器人零件从自由之城的破机器人商店里拖出来。没过多久，疯狂的眼球机器人开始蒸发人们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Melvin, genius that he clearly is, saved us all some time and just went ahead and stenciled his name on all his little death machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而梅尔文，他显然是个天才，为我们节省了不少时间，他直接把他的名字印在了所有的小型死亡机器上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably some goddamn pretentious shit about humans being corrupt and filthy, and how robots will take over the earth or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是一些自命不凡的狗屁，关于人类腐败和肮脏，以及机器人将如何接管地球之类的废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe some pulse grenades would be a good addition for this job. Up to you. As always, I don't care how you go about doing shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许再来点脉冲手榴弹会更好，由你决定。和往常一样，我不管你怎么干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMelvinDominatronQuest 10
I'll take the contract for Melvin Feldstein. [800 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要接梅尔文·费尔德斯坦的合同。[800瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots are fucking weird, and I do not like them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人真他妈奇怪，我不喜欢它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well. If someone tried to take on a contract for a robot in the first place, I'd tell 'em to get fucked. Seems like it all worked out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，如果有人一开始就想签一个机器人的合同，我会告诉他们去死吧。看来现在一切都解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have some cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一些现金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydomi_00040a0e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMelvinDominatronQuest 30
Turns out Feldstein was innocent. His robot went berserk. Killed him, and everyone else, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明费尔德斯坦是无辜的。他的机器人发狂了，杀了他，还有其他人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyWWConfirmedKill
...Shut up, nerd.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...闭嘴吧，书呆子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : And that's how you do fourth-wall humor without being dull and annoying about it. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullywwco_00042e17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously, how are you confirming kills without proof on my end? It doesn't make any sense...
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，在我没有证据的情况下你怎么确认我杀了人？这没有任何道理...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyEugeneSchrader
You know, I don't know what the fuck it is, but out of everyone on my list that needs killing, I might hate this guy the most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我他妈的不知道那是什么，但在我名单上所有需要杀戮的人中，我可能最痛恨这个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, the man is human garbage, no matter how you look at it. He's a slave trader that primarily preys on refugee families.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，不管你怎么看，他都是人类垃圾。他是一个以难民家庭为主要猎物的奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046405_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He likes to murder his competition, and he's been doing this shit for decades. But that isn't why I hate him as much as I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喜欢谋杀他的竞争对手，而且他已经干了几十年了。但这并不是我对他如此痛恨的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046405_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something about his face, maybe? His name? His fucking metaphysical aura, or some shit? I have no idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是他的脸？他的名字？他那该死的超自然光环还是什么其他的鬼东西？我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046405_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I know is that I hate him with all the intensity of the sun, so do me a favor, and make him die in the most painful way you can think up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道我对他恨之入骨，所以帮我个忙，用你能想到的最痛苦的方式让他死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046405_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEugeneSchraderQuest 10
I'll take Eugene Schrader. [4000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我选尤金·施拉德尔。[4000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here's your payout. Don't tell me how you killed him, please. In my head, I'm picturing... scaphism. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这是你的酬劳。求求你别告诉我你是怎么杀了他的，让我自己想象...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046406_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. That's about what he deserves. I don't want to know that he got off any easier than that... Scaphism. What a fucking tool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，这是他应得的，我不想知道他死得比...船刑舒服。真是个该死的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyeuge_00046406_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaEugeneSchraderQuest 30
Schrader's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 施拉德尔死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyNoMoreWork
Sorry, killer. You've already gone and completed every open contract I had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，杀手。你已经完成了我所有的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullynomo_00047605_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBurkeHitSquadTriggerREF.enable
I'd like to take on a new contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想签一个新合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyDeserterBurns
Alright, word of warning here. Burns was a Ranger until he got bored and deserted. Brought some military buddies along for the ride, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这里要提醒一下，伯恩斯曾是一名游骑兵，直到他厌倦了当了逃兵。他还带走了一些军队里的伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydese_00047c0c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means that they're gonna be armed to the teeth, and they actually have some weapons training.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着他们会全副武装，而且还受过专业的军事训练。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydese_00047c0c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, being a bunch of pussy-ass deserters, I imagine they're lacking in discipline. You should be able to handle it, I'd imagine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，作为一群懦弱的逃兵，我估计他们缺乏纪律，我猜你应该能应付得来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydese_00047c0c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDeserterBurnsQuest 10
I'll take the contract for Sebastian Burns. [5000 CAPS]
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要接塞巴斯蒂安·伯恩斯的合同。[5000瓶盖]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope it didn't take too much effort on your part, huh? Here's your cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你没费太大力气，对吧？这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullydese_00047c0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaDeserterBurnsQuest 30
I killed Ranger Burns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了游骑兵伯恩斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJoeTullyKnowAlquist
What the hell? Nobody's asked me about him in a long fucking time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽？他妈的已经很久没人打听过他的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyknow_0004c3dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I know him. We partnered up a few times. This was maybe a decade ago. Well before that goatfuck in Brighton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我认识他，我们做过几次搭档。这大概是十年前的事了，早在布莱顿搞得一团糟之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyknow_0004c3dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And let me just preemptively say, whatever the hell happened up there, I trust Caleb's judgement. I know he isn't some kill-crazy psychopath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先说一句，不管那里发生了什么，我相信凯莱布的判断。我知道他不是什么杀人狂魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyknow_0004c3dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, the man is cold as ice, but I ain't ever seen him go after someone that didn't have it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会我的意思，那人冷酷无情，但我从没见过他去追一个无辜的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyknow_0004c3dc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always been a fan of summarily executing targets. If someone's guilty, they're fucking guilty. No need to waste time and money on a trial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直是“立即处决目标”的粉丝。如果有人有罪，那就是他妈的有罪，没必要浪费时间和金钱在审判上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Tully [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([0600B2C3]aaaJoeTullyCoreQuest) 0600B2C3 (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\headhunting.esp\aaajoetullyvoicetype\aaajoetull_aaajoetullyknow_0004c3dc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know a bounty hunter named Caleb Alquist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识一个叫凯莱布·阿尔奎斯特的赏金猎人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hidden in the Branches
ESP.TRADUIT: 藏在枝头

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door is operated with a switch in the boss's office. Tired of having to remind you people to stop banging on the door because you're too dumb to remember this shit. Not like there's even any reason to open this pen without telling the boss, first. Get a new capture? Good, tell him and you'll get a bonus. Trying to liberate the cargo? Well, yeah, definitely go up and tell him if that's your intent. I'm sure he'll compensate you accordingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇门是由老板办公室里的一个开关操纵的。我受够了提醒你们别再敲门了，因为你们蠢得连这事都记不住。没必要在不告诉老板的情况下打开这个围栏。一个新的俘虏？很好，告诉他，你会得到奖金的。想把货物放出来吗？好吧，如果这是你的意图，你一定要去告诉他。我相信他会给予你相应的补偿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slaver's Reminder
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子的提醒

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as you cut her bonds, Grace quickly gets to her feet, and flees the area, deftly avoiding the corpses littering the floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一割断她的绑绳，格蕾丝就迅速站起来，逃离了这个地方，并巧妙地避开了地上散落的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑！
